They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts. Tell them: "Who can prevail with God for you if He wish you harm or benefit? Surely God is well aware of what you do.

text: بل ظننتم أن لن ينقلب الرسول والمؤمنون إلىٰ أهليهم أبدا وزين ذٰلك في قلوبكم وظننتم ظن السوء وكنتم قوما بورا
translation: In fact you imagined that the Prophet and the faithful would never come back home; and this seemed pleasing to your hearts, and you entertained evil thoughts. You are a people lost.

text: ومن لم يؤمن بالله ورسوله فإنا أعتدنا للكافرين سعيرا
translation: He who does not believe in God and His Apostle (should know) We have prepared for unbelievers a blazing fire."

text: ولله ملك السماوات والأرض ۚ يغفر لمن يشاء ويعذب من يشاء ۚ وكان الله غفورا رحيما
translation: To God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He may forgive whosoever He please, and afflict whosoever He will. Yet God is forgiving and kind.

text: سيقول المخلفون إذا انطلقتم إلىٰ مغانم لتأخذوها ذرونا نتبعكم ۖ يريدون أن يبدلوا كلام الله ۚ قل لن تتبعونا كذٰلكم قال الله من قبل ۖ فسيقولون بل تحسدوننا ۚ بل كانوا لا يفقهون إلا قليلا
translation: Those who had stayed behind will say: "When you depart for taking the spoils, allow us to follow you." They wish to change the word of God. Tell them: "You will not follow us. That is what God has already said before." They will say: "You are envious of our gain." The fact is they understand but little.

text: قل للمخلفين من الأعراب ستدعون إلىٰ قوم أولي بأس شديد تقاتلونهم أو يسلمون ۖ فإن تطيعوا يؤتكم الله أجرا حسنا ۖ وإن تتولوا كما توليتم من قبل يعذبكم عذابا أليما
translation: Say to the desert Arabs who had stayed behind: "You will be called against a formidable people. You will fight them till they surrender. If you obey, then He will give you a good reward; but if you turn back, as you had done before, He will punish you with a grievous affliction."

text: ليس على الأعمىٰ حرج ولا على الأعرج حرج ولا على المريض حرج ۗ ومن يطع الله ورسوله يدخله جنات تجري من تحتها الأنهار ۖ ومن يتول يعذبه عذابا أليما
translation: It is not binding on the blind, the lame or the sick (to follow this command); but those who obey God and His Apostle will be admitted by God to gardens with running streams; but those who turn back will suffer a painful doom.

text: لقد رضي الله عن المؤمنين إذ يبايعونك تحت الشجرة فعلم ما في قلوبهم فأنزل السكينة عليهم وأثابهم فتحا قريبا
translation: God was pleased with the believers when they swore allegiance to you under the tree, for He knew well what was in their hearts, and sent down tranquility on them, and rewarded them with an expeditious victory

text: ومغانم كثيرة يأخذونها ۗ وكان الله عزيزا حكيما
translation: And the many spoils that they were to take. God is all-mighty and all-wise.

text: وعدكم الله مغانم كثيرة تأخذونها فعجل لكم هٰذه وكف أيدي الناس عنكم ولتكون آية للمؤمنين ويهديكم صراطا مستقيما
translation: God had promised you many spoils that you would capture; so He gave this soon enough to you, and stayed the hands of men from you that it may serve as a sign for believers, and guide you on the straight path;

text: وأخرىٰ لم تقدروا عليها قد أحاط الله بها ۚ وكان الله علىٰ كل شيء قديرا
translation: And other (benefits) which you have not yet obtained, are within the compass of God, for God has power over everything.

text: ولو قاتلكم الذين كفروا لولوا الأدبار ثم لا يجدون وليا ولا نصيرا
translation: Had the unbelievers fought you they would have turned their backs and not found a protector or helper.

text: سنة الله التي قد خلت من قبل ۖ ولن تجد لسنة الله تبديلا
translation: This is the law of God, effective as before: You will not find any change in the law of God.

text: وهو الذي كف أيديهم عنكم وأيديكم عنهم ببطن مكة من بعد أن أظفركم عليهم ۚ وكان الله بما تعملون بصيرا
translation: It was He who restrained their hands from you in the heart of Makkah, and your hands from them, after He had given you victory over them, as God sees all that you do.

text: هم الذين كفروا وصدوكم عن المسجد الحرام والهدي معكوفا أن يبلغ محله ۚ ولولا رجال مؤمنون ونساء مؤمنات لم تعلموهم أن تطئوهم فتصيبكم منهم معرة بغير علم ۖ ليدخل الله في رحمته من يشاء ۚ لو تزيلوا لعذبنا الذين كفروا منهم عذابا أليما
translation: It were those who disbelieved who hindered you from (going to) the Holy Mosque, preventing your offerings from arriving at the place of sacrifice. Had it not been for (the presence of) believers, men and women, (among the unbelievers) of whom you were unaware, and whom you might have trampled and thus incurred guilt unknowingly on account of them, (the matter would have been settled). (But this was not done) so that God may admit into His favour whom He willed. If these (believers) had been separated from them, He would have inflicted a grievous punishment on the unbelievers.

text: إذ جعل الذين كفروا في قلوبهم الحمية حمية الجاهلية فأنزل الله سكينته علىٰ رسوله وعلى المؤمنين وألزمهم كلمة التقوىٰ وكانوا أحق بها وأهلها ۚ وكان الله بكل شيء عليما
translation: When the unbelievers fostered a sense of honour in their hearts, a sense of pagan honour, God sent down a sense of tranquility on His Apostle and the believers, and obliged them to an act of self-restraint, for they were deserving and worthy of it. God is cognisant of everything.

text: لقد صدق الله رسوله الرؤيا بالحق ۖ لتدخلن المسجد الحرام إن شاء الله آمنين محلقين رءوسكم ومقصرين لا تخافون ۖ فعلم ما لم تعلموا فجعل من دون ذٰلك فتحا قريبا
translation: God has truly made the vision of His Apostle come true: You will surely enter the Holy Mosque in security if God please, without any fear, having shaved your heads and cut your hair. He knew what you did not know, and has vouchsafed you, apart from this, a victory near at hand.

text: هو الذي أرسل رسوله بالهدىٰ ودين الحق ليظهره على الدين كله ۚ وكفىٰ بالله شهيدا
translation: It is He who has sent His Apostle with the guidance and the true faith, so that He may exalt it over every other creed. God is sufficient as a witness.

text: محمد رسول الله ۚ والذين معه أشداء على الكفار رحماء بينهم ۖ تراهم ركعا سجدا يبتغون فضلا من الله ورضوانا ۖ سيماهم في وجوههم من أثر السجود ۚ ذٰلك مثلهم في التوراة ۚ ومثلهم في الإنجيل كزرع أخرج شطأه فآزره فاستغلظ فاستوىٰ علىٰ سوقه يعجب الزراع ليغيظ بهم الكفار ۗ وعد الله الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات منهم مغفرة وأجرا عظيما
translation: Muhammad is the Prophet of God; and those who are with him are severe with infidels but compassionate among themselves. You may see them kneeling and bowing in reverence, seeking His favour and acceptance. Their mark is on their foreheads from the effect of prostrations. Their likeness in the Torah, and their likeness in the Gospel, is like a seed that sends out a stalk, then makes it firm, and it becomes strong and rises straight upon its stem, gladdening the cultivator's heart, in order to fill the unbelievers with dismay. God has promised those who believe and do the right forgiveness and a great reward.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم يا أيها الذين آمنوا لا تقدموا بين يدي الله ورسوله ۖ واتقوا الله ۚ إن الله سميع عليم
translation: O YOU WHO believe, do not forestall the judgements of God and His Apostle, and have fear of God. Verily God hears all and knows everything.

text: يا أيها الذين آمنوا لا ترفعوا أصواتكم فوق صوت النبي ولا تجهروا له بالقول كجهر بعضكم لبعض أن تحبط أعمالكم وأنتم لا تشعرون
translation: O you who believe, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet, and do not speak loudly to him as you do with one another lest your deeds are nullified unconsciously.

text: إن الذين يغضون أصواتهم عند رسول الله أولٰئك الذين امتحن الله قلوبهم للتقوىٰ ۚ لهم مغفرة وأجر عظيم
translation: They who speak in a low voice in the presence of God's Apostle, have had their hearts tried by God for reverence. There is forgiveness for them and a great reward.

text: إن الذين ينادونك من وراء الحجرات أكثرهم لا يعقلون
translation: Many of those who call you from outside the apartments are not considerate.

text: ولو أنهم صبروا حتىٰ تخرج إليهم لكان خيرا لهم ۚ والله غفور رحيم
translation: If they had waited for you to come out it would have been better for them. But God is forgiving and kind.

text: يا أيها الذين آمنوا إن جاءكم فاسق بنبإ فتبينوا أن تصيبوا قوما بجهالة فتصبحوا علىٰ ما فعلتم نادمين
translation: O you who believe, if a dissolute person brings some news, verify it first lest you attack a people ignorantly and later regret what you had done.

text: واعلموا أن فيكم رسول الله ۚ لو يطيعكم في كثير من الأمر لعنتم ولٰكن الله حبب إليكم الإيمان وزينه في قلوبكم وكره إليكم الكفر والفسوق والعصيان ۚ أولٰئك هم الراشدون
translation: Know that the Apostle of God is among you: If he agreed with you in most matters you would surely come to grief. But God has made faith more desirable to you, and attractive to your hearts, and rendered disbelief and sin and disobedience repugnant. They are those who are well directed

text: فضلا من الله ونعمة ۚ والله عليم حكيم
translation: By God's benevolence and His grace. God is all-knowing and all-wise.

text: وإن طائفتان من المؤمنين اقتتلوا فأصلحوا بينهما ۖ فإن بغت إحداهما على الأخرىٰ فقاتلوا التي تبغي حتىٰ تفيء إلىٰ أمر الله ۚ فإن فاءت فأصلحوا بينهما بالعدل وأقسطوا ۖ إن الله يحب المقسطين
translation: If two groups of believers come to fight one another, promote peace between them. Then if one of them turns aggressive against the other, fight against the aggressive party till it returns to God's authority. If it does so, make peace among them equitably and be impartial. Verily God loves those who are just.

text: إنما المؤمنون إخوة فأصلحوا بين أخويكم ۚ واتقوا الله لعلكم ترحمون
translation: The faithful are surely brothers; so restore friendship among your brothers, and fear God that you may be favoured.

text: يا أيها الذين آمنوا لا يسخر قوم من قوم عسىٰ أن يكونوا خيرا منهم ولا نساء من نساء عسىٰ أن يكن خيرا منهن ۖ ولا تلمزوا أنفسكم ولا تنابزوا بالألقاب ۖ بئس الاسم الفسوق بعد الإيمان ۚ ومن لم يتب فأولٰئك هم الظالمون
translation: O you who believe, men should not laugh at other men, for it may be they are better than them; and women should not laugh at other women, for they may perhaps be better than them. Do not slander one another, nor give one another nick-names. After believing, it is bad to give (another) a bad name. Those who do not repent behave wickedly.

text: يا أيها الذين آمنوا اجتنبوا كثيرا من الظن إن بعض الظن إثم ۖ ولا تجسسوا ولا يغتب بعضكم بعضا ۚ أيحب أحدكم أن يأكل لحم أخيه ميتا فكرهتموه ۚ واتقوا الله ۚ إن الله تواب رحيم
translation: O you who believe, avoid most suspicions: Some suspicions are indeed sins. So do not pry into others' secrets and do not backbite. Would any of you like to eat a dead brother's flesh? You would surely be revolted by it Then fear God. He is certainly forgiving and kind.

text: يا أيها الناس إنا خلقناكم من ذكر وأنثىٰ وجعلناكم شعوبا وقبائل لتعارفوا ۚ إن أكرمكم عند الله أتقاكم ۚ إن الله عليم خبير
translation: O men, We created you from a male and female, and formed you into nations and tribes that you may recognise each other. He who has more integrity has indeed greater honour with God. Surely God is all-knowing and well-informed.

text: قالت الأعراب آمنا ۖ قل لم تؤمنوا ولٰكن قولوا أسلمنا ولما يدخل الإيمان في قلوبكم ۖ وإن تطيعوا الله ورسوله لا يلتكم من أعمالكم شيئا ۚ إن الله غفور رحيم
translation: The Arabs of the desert say: "We believe." Tell them: "You do not believe. Better say: 'We submit'; for belief has not yet penetrated your hearts." If you begin to obey God and His Apostle, He will not withhold the least (of the recompense) of your labour. Verily God is forgiving and kind."

text: إنما المؤمنون الذين آمنوا بالله ورسوله ثم لم يرتابوا وجاهدوا بأموالهم وأنفسهم في سبيل الله ۚ أولٰئك هم الصادقون
translation: They alone are believers who come to believe in God and His Apostle, then never doubt again, and struggle wealth and soul in the way of God. They are the truthful and sincere.

text: قل أتعلمون الله بدينكم والله يعلم ما في السماوات وما في الأرض ۚ والله بكل شيء عليم
translation: Say: "Are you trying to convince God of your faithfulness? But God knows all there is in the heavens and the earth, for God has knowledge of everything."

text: يمنون عليك أن أسلموا ۖ قل لا تمنوا علي إسلامكم ۖ بل الله يمن عليكم أن هداكم للإيمان إن كنتم صادقين
translation: They impress upon you that they have submitted. Tell them: "Do not favour me with your submission. In fact God has favoured you by showing you the way to belief, if you are men of truth."

text: إن الله يعلم غيب السماوات والأرض ۚ والله بصير بما تعملون
translation: Verily God knows the unknown of the heavens and the earth; and God perceives all you do.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم ق ۚ والقرآن المجيد
translation: QAF. I CALL to witness the glorious Qur'an.

text: بل عجبوا أن جاءهم منذر منهم فقال الكافرون هٰذا شيء عجيب
translation: They are rather surprised that a warner from among themselves has come to them. So the unbelievers say: "This is astonishing:

text: أإذا متنا وكنا ترابا ۖ ذٰلك رجع بعيد
translation: When we are dead and turned to dust, this returning (to life) is most far-fetched."

text: قد علمنا ما تنقص الأرض منهم ۖ وعندنا كتاب حفيظ
translation: We know what the earth consumes of them, for We have the Book that preserves everything.

text: بل كذبوا بالحق لما جاءهم فهم في أمر مريج
translation: But no! They called the truth a lie when it came to them; so they are in a confused state.

text: أفلم ينظروا إلى السماء فوقهم كيف بنيناها وزيناها وما لها من فروج
translation: Have they not looked at the sky above them, how We have fashioned and adorned it, and it has no flaw?

text: والأرض مددناها وألقينا فيها رواسي وأنبتنا فيها من كل زوج بهيج
translation: We stretched the earth and placed upon it firm stabilisers and We made every kind of splendid thing to grow upon it

text: تبصرة وذكرىٰ لكل عبد منيب
translation: As instruction and reminder to every penitent creature.

text: ونزلنا من السماء ماء مباركا فأنبتنا به جنات وحب الحصيد
translation: And We send down water as a blessing from the sky, and grow gardens with it and the grain for harvest,

text: والنخل باسقات لها طلع نضيد
translation: And tall date-palms with their spathes pile on pile

text: رزقا للعباد ۖ وأحيينا به بلدة ميتا ۚ كذٰلك الخروج
translation: As a provision for men, and enlivened a region that was dead. Even thus will be the life after death.

text: كذبت قبلهم قوم نوح وأصحاب الرس وثمود
translation: The people of Noah, Ar-Rass and Thamud denied before you,

text: وعاد وفرعون وإخوان لوط
translation: As did the people of 'Ad and Pharaoh and the brethren of Lot,

text: وأصحاب الأيكة وقوم تبع ۚ كل كذب الرسل فحق وعيد
translation: And the dwellers of the Wood and people of Tubba'. Each of them denied the apostles. So My threat became a reality.

text: أفعيينا بالخلق الأول ۚ بل هم في لبس من خلق جديد
translation: Were We exhausted by the act of the first creation? And yet they are confused about a new creation.

text: ولقد خلقنا الإنسان ونعلم ما توسوس به نفسه ۖ ونحن أقرب إليه من حبل الوريد
translation: He created man and surely know what misdoubts arise in their hearts; for We are closer to him than his jugular vein.

text: إذ يتلقى المتلقيان عن اليمين وعن الشمال قعيد
translation: When the two (angels) who keep the account, one sitting on the right, one on the left, take it down,

text: ما يلفظ من قول إلا لديه رقيب عتيد
translation: There is not a word he utters but an observer is ready (to make note of it).

text: وجاءت سكرة الموت بالحق ۖ ذٰلك ما كنت منه تحيد
translation: The palsy of death will surely come. This is what you wished to avert.

text: ونفخ في الصور ۚ ذٰلك يوم الوعيد
translation: And the trumpet blast will sound: It would be the Day of Doom.

text: وجاءت كل نفس معها سائق وشهيد
translation: Each soul will come with a driver and a witness.

text: لقد كنت في غفلة من هٰذا فكشفنا عنك غطاءك فبصرك اليوم حديد
translation: (And the driver will say:) "You were oblivious of this, so we have removed the veil, and how keen is your sight today!"

text: وقال قرينه هٰذا ما لدي عتيد
translation: His companion will say: "Here is (the record) I have ready with me."

text: ألقيا في جهنم كل كفار عنيد
translation: "Cast each stubborn unbeliever into Hell," (they will be told),

text: مناع للخير معتد مريب
translation: "Every obstructor of good, transgressor, and the sceptic,

text: الذي جعل مع الله إلٰها آخر فألقياه في العذاب الشديد
translation: Who had set up another god with God. Cast him into severe torment."

text: قال قرينه ربنا ما أطغيته ولٰكن كان في ضلال بعيد
translation: His companion will say: "O Lord, I did not lead him to wickedness, but he was himself far astray."

text: قال لا تختصموا لدي وقد قدمت إليكم بالوعيد
translation: "Do not argue in My presence. I had announced the promise of doom in advance.

text: ما يبدل القول لدي وما أنا بظلام للعبيد
translation: There is no changing of My word, nor am I unjust to My creatures."

text: يوم نقول لجهنم هل امتلأت وتقول هل من مزيد
translation: We shall ask Hell that day: "Are you full?" It will answer: "Are there still more?"

text: وأزلفت الجنة للمتقين غير بعيد
translation: And Paradise will be brought near, not far from those who took heed for themselves and feared God.

text: هٰذا ما توعدون لكل أواب حفيظ
translation: "This is what you had been promised," (will be said) to every penitent who remembered (his duty),

text: من خشي الرحمٰن بالغيب وجاء بقلب منيب
translation: Who feared Ar-Rahman in secret, and came with a penitent heart:

text: ادخلوها بسلام ۖ ذٰلك يوم الخلود
translation: "Enter it in peace. This is the day of life abiding."

text: لهم ما يشاءون فيها ولدينا مزيد
translation: Theirs will be whatsoever they wish: And with Us there is more.

text: وكم أهلكنا قبلهم من قرن هم أشد منهم بطشا فنقبوا في البلاد هل من محيص
translation: How many generations have We destroyed before them who were mightier in power than they. Then they searched throughout the land to see if there was a way of escape.

text: إن في ذٰلك لذكرىٰ لمن كان له قلب أو ألقى السمع وهو شهيد
translation: Surely there is a reminder in this for whosoever has a heart (to feel), or takes heed.

text: ولقد خلقنا السماوات والأرض وما بينهما في ستة أيام وما مسنا من لغوب
translation: We created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, in six spans, and no weariness came upon Us.

text: فاصبر علىٰ ما يقولون وسبح بحمد ربك قبل طلوع الشمس وقبل الغروب
translation: So you bear with patience what they say, and sing the praises of your Lord before the rising of the sun and its setting,

text: ومن الليل فسبحه وأدبار السجود
translation: And glorify Him for some portion of the night, and additional adorations.

text: واستمع يوم يناد المناد من مكان قريب
translation: Take heed that the day the crier calls from a place close (to every one),

text: يوم يسمعون الصيحة بالحق ۚ ذٰلك يوم الخروج
translation: The day they actually hear the blast, will be the Day of rising of the dead.

text: إنا نحن نحيي ونميت وإلينا المصير
translation: We are the one who give life and death, and to Us will be the destination.

text: يوم تشقق الأرض عنهم سراعا ۚ ذٰلك حشر علينا يسير
translation: The day the earth will split asunder they will come out hurriedly. This gathering together is easy for Us.

text: نحن أعلم بما يقولون ۖ وما أنت عليهم بجبار ۖ فذكر بالقرآن من يخاف وعيد
translation: We are cognisant of what they say; but it is not for you to compel them. So keep on reminding through the Qur'an whoever fears My warning.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والذاريات ذروا
translation: I CALL TO witness those who scatter (dust) by dispersing,

text: فالحاملات وقرا
translation: And those who bear the load (of rain),

text: فالجاريات يسرا
translation: And those who move (on the water) gently,

text: فالمقسمات أمرا
translation: And those who distribute (it) by command,

text: إنما توعدون لصادق
translation: Verily the promise made to you is true:

text: وإن الدين لواقع
translation: The Judgement will indeed take place.

text: والسماء ذات الحبك
translation: The heavens webbed-with-tracks is witness

text: إنكم لفي قول مختلف
translation: You are surely caught in contradictions.,

text: يؤفك عنه من أفك
translation: From which only he turns who is turned away.

text: قتل الخراصون
translation: Perish will those who just guess and speculate,

text: الذين هم في غمرة ساهون
translation: Who are lost in deception.

text: يسألون أيان يوم الدين
translation: They ask: "When is the Day of Judgement?" --

text: يوم هم على النار يفتنون
translation: The day they will be burnt in the Fire,

text: ذوقوا فتنتكم هٰذا الذي كنتم به تستعجلون
translation: (And told:) "Taste your punishment. This is what you were trying to hasten."

text: إن المتقين في جنات وعيون
translation: Surely those who fear God and follow the straight path will be amidst gardens and fresh springs of water,

text: آخذين ما آتاهم ربهم ۚ إنهم كانوا قبل ذٰلك محسنين
translation: Receiving what is given them by their Lord. They were surely the virtuous before this.

text: كانوا قليلا من الليل ما يهجعون
translation: They slept little in the night,

text: وبالأسحار هم يستغفرون
translation: And every morning asked forgiveness,

text: وفي أموالهم حق للسائل والمحروم
translation: In whose wealth the suppliant and the deprived had a share.

text: وفي الأرض آيات للموقنين
translation: There are signs in the earth for those who are firm in their faith,

text: وفي أنفسكم ۚ أفلا تبصرون
translation: And within yourselves. Can you not perceive?

text: وفي السماء رزقكم وما توعدون
translation: There is in the heavens your sustenance, and whatever has been promised you.

text: فورب السماء والأرض إنه لحق مثل ما أنكم تنطقون
translation: By the Lord of the heavens and the earth, this is certainly true even as you speak.

text: هل أتاك حديث ضيف إبراهيم المكرمين
translation: Has the story of Abraham's honoured guests come to you?

text: إذ دخلوا عليه فقالوا سلاما ۖ قال سلام قوم منكرون
translation: When they came to him, they said: "Peace." He answered: "Peace." They were a people he did not recognise.

text: فراغ إلىٰ أهله فجاء بعجل سمين
translation: So he hurried to the house and brought a fatted calf,

text: فقربه إليهم قال ألا تأكلون
translation: And placing it before them said: "Won't you eat?"

text: فأوجس منهم خيفة ۖ قالوا لا تخف ۖ وبشروه بغلام عليم
translation: He felt afraid of them; but they said: "Have no fear," and gave him the good news of a wise son.

text: فأقبلت امرأته في صرة فصكت وجهها وقالت عجوز عقيم
translation: His wife came out lamenting, striking her forehead, and said: "I, am old and barren woman?"

text: قالوا كذٰلك قال ربك ۖ إنه هو الحكيم العليم
translation: They said: "Thus said your Lord. He is indeed all-wise and all-knowing."

text: قال فما خطبكم أيها المرسلون
translation: He said: "What is then your business, O messengers?"

text: قالوا إنا أرسلنا إلىٰ قوم مجرمين
translation: They said: "We have been sent to a wicked people

text: لنرسل عليهم حجارة من طين
translation: So as to let loose clods of clay on them

text: مسومة عند ربك للمسرفين
translation: Marked by your Lord for those who waste their substance."

text: فأخرجنا من كان فيها من المؤمنين
translation: So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,

text: فما وجدنا فيها غير بيت من المسلمين
translation: But did not find more than a single family of believers.

text: وتركنا فيها آية للذين يخافون العذاب الأليم
translation: We left a sign in this for those who fear the grievous punishment,

text: وفي موسىٰ إذ أرسلناه إلىٰ فرعون بسلطان مبين
translation: As (there was) in Moses when We sent him to the Pharaoh with clear authority.

text: فتولىٰ بركنه وقال ساحر أو مجنون
translation: But he turned to his counsellors, and said: "He is a magician or lunatic."

text: فأخذناه وجنوده فنبذناهم في اليم وهو مليم
translation: So We seized him and his armies, and threw them into the sea, for he was worthy of blame.

text: وفي عاد إذ أرسلنا عليهم الريح العقيم
translation: In 'Ad (also is a sign), when We sent a blasting wind against them,

text: ما تذر من شيء أتت عليه إلا جعلته كالرميم
translation: Which turned everything it touched to ashes.

text: وفي ثمود إذ قيل لهم تمتعوا حتىٰ حين
translation: And in Thamud, when We said to them: "Enjoy yourselves for a while;"

text: فعتوا عن أمر ربهم فأخذتهم الصاعقة وهم ينظرون
translation: But they disobeyed the command of their Lord; so they were destroyed by a thunderbolt, and they could only gape,

text: فما استطاعوا من قيام وما كانوا منتصرين
translation: And neither stand up nor defend themselves.

text: وقوم نوح من قبل ۖ إنهم كانوا قوما فاسقين
translation: (So had We destroyed) the people of Noah before them: They were surely a sinful people.

text: والسماء بنيناها بأيد وإنا لموسعون
translation: We built the heavens by Our authority; and We are the Lord of power and expanse.

text: والأرض فرشناها فنعم الماهدون
translation: We spread the earth a carpet; what comfort We provide!

text: ومن كل شيء خلقنا زوجين لعلكم تذكرون
translation: And We created pairs of everything that you may contemplate.

text: ففروا إلى الله ۖ إني لكم منه نذير مبين
translation: So turn to God. I give you a clear warning from Him.

text: ولا تجعلوا مع الله إلٰها آخر ۖ إني لكم منه نذير مبين
translation: Do not set up another god with God. I give you a clear warning from Him.

text: كذٰلك ما أتى الذين من قبلهم من رسول إلا قالوا ساحر أو مجنون
translation: Even thus no apostle came to those before them but they said: "He is a sorcerer or a mad man."

text: أتواصوا به ۚ بل هم قوم طاغون
translation: Is this the legacy they have passed down from one to the other? In fact, they are a rebellious people.

text: فتول عنهم فما أنت بملوم
translation: Turn away from them. You will not be blamed.

text: وذكر فإن الذكرىٰ تنفع المؤمنين
translation: But go on reminding them, as reminding benefits the believers.

text: وما خلقت الجن والإنس إلا ليعبدون
translation: I have not created the jinns and men but to worship Me.

text: ما أريد منهم من رزق وما أريد أن يطعمون
translation: I want no sustenance from them nor do I want them to feed Me.

text: إن الله هو الرزاق ذو القوة المتين
translation: God is certainly the great provider, Lord of strength and power.

text: فإن للذين ظلموا ذنوبا مثل ذنوب أصحابهم فلا يستعجلون
translation: Those who do wrong will indeed come to the same end as their fellows (of old). So let them not ask Me to hasten (the punishment).

text: فويل للذين كفروا من يومهم الذي يوعدون
translation: Alas the woe for those who refuse to believe in the Day which has been promised them.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والطور
translation: I CALL TO witness the Mount Sinai,

text: وكتاب مسطور
translation: And the Scripture inscribed

text: في رق منشور
translation: On a parchment scroll unrolled,

text: والبيت المعمور
translation: The house ever-peopled,

text: والسقف المرفوع
translation: The roof raised high,

text: والبحر المسجور
translation: And the swollen sea,

text: إن عذاب ربك لواقع
translation: The punishment of your Lord is certain to come.

text: ما له من دافع
translation: There is none who could avert it.

text: يوم تمور السماء مورا
translation: The day the sky will tremble,

text: وتسير الجبال سيرا
translation: The mountains move and fly away,

text: فويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Will be the day of woe for those

text: الذين هم في خوض يلعبون
translation: Who, ignoring the Reality, engage in pleasantries.

text: يوم يدعون إلىٰ نار جهنم دعا
translation: The day they are dragged and pushed into Hell,

text: هٰذه النار التي كنتم بها تكذبون
translation: (And told:) "This is the fire which you denied.

text: أفسحر هٰذا أم أنتم لا تبصرون
translation: Is it magic, or you cannot see?

text: اصلوها فاصبروا أو لا تصبروا سواء عليكم ۖ إنما تجزون ما كنتم تعملون
translation: Roast in it. Bear it with patience or impatience, it will be the same for you. You will be requited for what you had done."

text: إن المتقين في جنات ونعيم
translation: Those who fear God and follow the straight path will surely be in gardens and in bliss,

text: فاكهين بما آتاهم ربهم ووقاهم ربهم عذاب الجحيم
translation: Rejoicing at what their Lord has given them; and their Lord will preserve them from the torment of Hell.

text: كلوا واشربوا هنيئا بما كنتم تعملون
translation: "Eat and drink with relish," (they will be told), (as recompense) for what you had done."

text: متكئين علىٰ سرر مصفوفة ۖ وزوجناهم بحور عين
translation: They would recline on couches set in rows, paired with fair companions (clean of thought and) bright of eye.

text: والذين آمنوا واتبعتهم ذريتهم بإيمان ألحقنا بهم ذريتهم وما ألتناهم من عملهم من شيء ۚ كل امرئ بما كسب رهين
translation: And those who believed, and whose progeny also followed them in their faith, will be united with their offspring. We will not deprive them of their labour in the least. Every man is bound to what he does.

text: وأمددناهم بفاكهة ولحم مما يشتهون
translation: We shall give them fruits and meats, and what they desire.

text: يتنازعون فيها كأسا لا لغو فيها ولا تأثيم
translation: They will exchange cups of wine free of (incitement to) pleasantry or sin.

text: ويطوف عليهم غلمان لهم كأنهم لؤلؤ مكنون
translation: And young attendants like pearls within their shells, will go round.

text: وأقبل بعضهم علىٰ بعض يتساءلون
translation: They will ask each other questions,

text: قالوا إنا كنا قبل في أهلنا مشفقين
translation: Saying: "We were also once full of fear at home.

text: فمن الله علينا ووقانا عذاب السموم
translation: But God has been gracious to us, and has saved us from the torment of scorching wind.

text: إنا كنا من قبل ندعوه ۖ إنه هو البر الرحيم
translation: We used to pray to Him erstwhile; He is the just and merciful.

text: فذكر فما أنت بنعمت ربك بكاهن ولا مجنون
translation: Remind them, therefore, that by the grace of your Lord you are neither a soothsayer nor possessed.

text: أم يقولون شاعر نتربص به ريب المنون
translation: Do they say: "He is a poet for whom we expect an adverse turn of fortune?"

text: قل تربصوا فإني معكم من المتربصين
translation: Tell them: "Keep on expecting, I am expecting with you."

text: أم تأمرهم أحلامهم بهٰذا ۚ أم هم قوم طاغون
translation: Does their reasoning prompt them to this, or they are a people rebellious?

text: أم يقولون تقوله ۚ بل لا يؤمنون
translation: Or do they say: "He has fabricated it?" In fact, they will never believe.

text: فليأتوا بحديث مثله إن كانوا صادقين
translation: So let them bring a discourse like it, if they are truthful

text: أم خلقوا من غير شيء أم هم الخالقون
translation: Or were they created of themselves? Or are they the creators?

text: أم خلقوا السماوات والأرض ۚ بل لا يوقنون
translation: Or have they created the heavens and the earth? In fact they are certain of nothing.

text: أم عندهم خزائن ربك أم هم المصيطرون
translation: Do they possess the treasures of your Lord? Or are they the treasurers?

text: أم لهم سلم يستمعون فيه ۖ فليأت مستمعهم بسلطان مبين
translation: Or do they have a ladder (climbing which) they can hear (the secrets of heaven)? Let one who has heard then bring a clear proof.

text: أم له البنات ولكم البنون
translation: Has (God) daughters and they sons?

text: أم تسألهم أجرا فهم من مغرم مثقلون
translation: Or do you demand any wages from them so that they are burdened with expense?

text: أم عندهم الغيب فهم يكتبون
translation: Or do they have knowledge of the Unknown which they write down?

text: أم يريدون كيدا ۖ فالذين كفروا هم المكيدون
translation: Or do they want to stage a deception? -- Then only those who do not believe will be the ones who will be tricked.

text: أم لهم إلٰه غير الله ۚ سبحان الله عما يشركون
translation: Or do they have a god apart from God? He is too exalted for what they associate with Him!

text: وإن يروا كسفا من السماء ساقطا يقولوا سحاب مركوم
translation: If they should see a segment falling from the sky, they would say: "It is only a massive cloud."

text: فذرهم حتىٰ يلاقوا يومهم الذي فيه يصعقون
translation: So, leave them until they face their day (of doom) when they will be stunned.

text: يوم لا يغني عنهم كيدهم شيئا ولا هم ينصرون
translation: Their deception will not avail them in the least on that day, nor will they be helped.

text: وإن للذين ظلموا عذابا دون ذٰلك ولٰكن أكثرهم لا يعلمون
translation: Surely there are other torments besides this for those who are wicked, though most of them do not know.

text: واصبر لحكم ربك فإنك بأعيننا ۖ وسبح بحمد ربك حين تقوم
translation: Await the judgement of your Lord, for you are always before Our eyes, and glorify your Lord with praises when you rise,

text: ومن الليل فسبحه وإدبار النجوم
translation: And glorify Him in the night and when the stars begin to wane.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والنجم إذا هوىٰ
translation: I CALL TO witness the star of the pleiades when it has dipped

text: ما ضل صاحبكم وما غوىٰ
translation: That your companion is not confused, nor has he gone astray,

text: وما ينطق عن الهوىٰ
translation: Neither does he speak of his own will.

text: إن هو إلا وحي يوحىٰ
translation: This is only revelation communicated,

text: علمه شديد القوىٰ
translation: Bestowed on him by the Supreme Intellect,

text: ذو مرة فاستوىٰ
translation: Lord of power and wisdom. So he acquired poise and balance,

text: وهو بالأفق الأعلىٰ
translation: And reached the highest pinnacle.

text: ثم دنا فتدلىٰ
translation: Then he drew near and drew closer

text: فكان قاب قوسين أو أدنىٰ
translation: Until a space of two bow (arcs) or even less remained,

text: فأوحىٰ إلىٰ عبده ما أوحىٰ
translation: When He revealed to His votary what He revealed.

text: ما كذب الفؤاد ما رأىٰ
translation: His heart did not falsify what he perceived.

text: أفتمارونه علىٰ ما يرىٰ
translation: Will you dispute with him what he saw?

text: ولقد رآه نزلة أخرىٰ
translation: He saw Him indeed another time

text: عند سدرة المنتهىٰ
translation: By the Lote-tree beyond which none can pass,

text: عندها جنة المأوىٰ
translation: Close to which is the Garden of Tranquility,

text: إذ يغشى السدرة ما يغشىٰ
translation: When the Lote-tree was covered over with what it was covered over;

text: ما زاغ البصر وما طغىٰ
translation: Neither did sight falter nor exceed the bounds.

text: لقد رأىٰ من آيات ربه الكبرىٰ
translation: Indeed he saw some of the greatest signs of His Lord.

text: أفرأيتم اللات والعزىٰ
translation: Have you considered Lat and 'Uzza,

text: ومناة الثالثة الأخرىٰ
translation: And Manat, the other third (of the pagan deities)?

text: ألكم الذكر وله الأنثىٰ
translation: Are there sons for you, and daughters for Him?

text: تلك إذا قسمة ضيزىٰ
translation: This is certainly an unjust apportioning.

text: إن هي إلا أسماء سميتموها أنتم وآباؤكم ما أنزل الله بها من سلطان ۚ إن يتبعون إلا الظن وما تهوى الأنفس ۖ ولقد جاءهم من ربهم الهدىٰ
translation: These are only names which you and your fathers have invented. No authority was sent down by God for them. They only follow conjecture and wish-fulfilment, even though guidance had come to them already from their Lord.

text: أم للإنسان ما تمنىٰ
translation: Can ever man get what he desires?

text: فلله الآخرة والأولىٰ
translation: To God belong the End and the Beginning.

text: وكم من ملك في السماوات لا تغني شفاعتهم شيئا إلا من بعد أن يأذن الله لمن يشاء ويرضىٰ
translation: Many as the angels be in heaven their intercession will not avail in the least without God's permission for whomsoever He please and approve.

text: إن الذين لا يؤمنون بالآخرة ليسمون الملائكة تسمية الأنثىٰ
translation: Those who do not believe in the Hereafter give the angels names of females.

text: وما لهم به من علم ۖ إن يتبعون إلا الظن ۖ وإن الظن لا يغني من الحق شيئا
translation: Yet they have no knowledge of this, and follow nothing but conjecture, but conjecture cannot replace the truth.

text: فأعرض عن من تولىٰ عن ذكرنا ولم يرد إلا الحياة الدنيا
translation: So you turn away from him who turns away from Our rememberance and wants nothing but the life of this world:

text: ذٰلك مبلغهم من العلم ۚ إن ربك هو أعلم بمن ضل عن سبيله وهو أعلم بمن اهتدىٰ
translation: This is the farthest limit of their knowledge. Surely your Lord alone knows best who has strayed away from the path and who has come to guidance.

text: ولله ما في السماوات وما في الأرض ليجزي الذين أساءوا بما عملوا ويجزي الذين أحسنوا بالحسنى
translation: To God belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, that He may requite those who do evil, in accordance with their deeds, and those who do good with good.

text: الذين يجتنبون كبائر الإثم والفواحش إلا اللمم ۚ إن ربك واسع المغفرة ۚ هو أعلم بكم إذ أنشأكم من الأرض وإذ أنتم أجنة في بطون أمهاتكم ۖ فلا تزكوا أنفسكم ۖ هو أعلم بمن اتقىٰ
translation: As for those who avoid the greater sins and shameful acts, except minor trespasses, your Lord's forgiveness surely has great amplitude. He is fully knowledgeable of you as He produced you from the earth, and since you were a foetus in your mother's womb. So do not assert your goodness; he is better who takes heed and preserves himself.

text: أفرأيت الذي تولىٰ
translation: Have you seen him who turns his back,

text: وأعطىٰ قليلا وأكدىٰ
translation: Who gives but little, and is niggardly?

text: أعنده علم الغيب فهو يرىٰ
translation: Has he knowledge of the Unknown that he perceives everything?

text: أم لم ينبأ بما في صحف موسىٰ
translation: Has he not heard what is contained in the Book of Moses,

text: وإبراهيم الذي وفىٰ
translation: And of Abraham who fulfilled his trust? --

text: ألا تزر وازرة وزر أخرىٰ
translation: That no one who carries a burden bears another's load;

text: وأن ليس للإنسان إلا ما سعىٰ
translation: That a man receives but only that for which he strives;

text: وأن سعيه سوف يرىٰ
translation: That his endeavours will be judged,

text: ثم يجزاه الجزاء الأوفىٰ
translation: And only then will he receive his recompense in full;

text: وأن إلىٰ ربك المنتهىٰ
translation: And that to your Lord is your returning;

text: وأنه هو أضحك وأبكىٰ
translation: That it is He who makes you happy and morose,

text: وأنه هو أمات وأحيا
translation: And He who ordains death and life;

text: وأنه خلق الزوجين الذكر والأنثىٰ
translation: That He created pairs, male and female,

text: من نطفة إذا تمنىٰ
translation: From a drop of semen when emitted;

text: وأن عليه النشأة الأخرىٰ
translation: That the second creation is incumbent on Him;

text: وأنه هو أغنىٰ وأقنىٰ
translation: That it is He who makes you rich and contented;

text: وأنه هو رب الشعرىٰ
translation: That He is the Lord of Sirius;

text: وأنه أهلك عادا الأولىٰ
translation: That it was He who destroyed the 'Ad of old,

text: وثمود فما أبقىٰ
translation: And Thamud, and did not leave them,

text: وقوم نوح من قبل ۖ إنهم كانوا هم أظلم وأطغىٰ
translation: Like the people of Noah before them, who were surely oppressors and rebellious;

text: والمؤتفكة أهوىٰ
translation: And He overthrew the Cities of the Plain,

text: فغشاها ما غشىٰ
translation: So that they were covered over by what they were covered over.

text: فبأي آلاء ربك تتمارىٰ
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: هٰذا نذير من النذر الأولىٰ
translation: He who warns you is one of the warners of old.

text: أزفت الآزفة
translation: What is to come is imminent.

text: ليس لها من دون الله كاشفة
translation: There is no one to unveil it apart from God.

text: أفمن هٰذا الحديث تعجبون
translation: Are you astonished at this news,

text: وتضحكون ولا تبكون
translation: And keep laughing and do not weep,

text: وأنتم سامدون
translation: Indulging in pleasantries?

text: فاسجدوا لله واعبدوا ۩
translation: Bow instead in adoration before God and worship Him.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم اقتربت الساعة وانشق القمر
translation: THE HOUR HAS come and split is the moon.

text: وإن يروا آية يعرضوا ويقولوا سحر مستمر
translation: But if they see a sign they turn away, and say: "This is the same old lie continuing,"

text: وكذبوا واتبعوا أهواءهم ۚ وكل أمر مستقر
translation: And deny, and follow their own vain desires; but every matter is determined at its time.

text: ولقد جاءهم من الأنباء ما فيه مزدجر
translation: Messages deterring them from evil had come to them,

text: حكمة بالغة ۖ فما تغن النذر
translation: Containing consummate wisdom; yet warnings were of no avail.

text: فتول عنهم ۘ يوم يدع الداع إلىٰ شيء نكر
translation: So turn away from them. When on the Day the crier calls to the painful business,

text: خشعا أبصارهم يخرجون من الأجداث كأنهم جراد منتشر
translation: They will come out of the graves with downcast eyes like an expanding swarm of locusts.

text: مهطعين إلى الداع ۖ يقول الكافرون هٰذا يوم عسر
translation: They will hasten forward to the caller, gazes fixed. And the unbelievers will say: "This is the day of untold woe."

text: كذبت قبلهم قوم نوح فكذبوا عبدنا وقالوا مجنون وازدجر
translation: The people of Noah had denied before them, and had called Our votary a liar, and said: "He is possessed," and repulsed him.

text: فدعا ربه أني مغلوب فانتصر
translation: So he prayed to his Lord: "I am helpless, deliver me."

text: ففتحنا أبواب السماء بماء منهمر
translation: And We opened up the flood gates of the sky with water pouring down in torrents,

text: وفجرنا الأرض عيونا فالتقى الماء علىٰ أمر قد قدر
translation: And We opened up the springs of the earth; and the waters met for a decreed end.

text: وحملناه علىٰ ذات ألواح ودسر
translation: But We bore him on a (vessel made) of planks and oakum,

text: تجري بأعيننا جزاء لمن كان كفر
translation: Which sailed right under Our eyes: A recompense for him who had been denied.

text: ولقد تركناها آية فهل من مدكر
translation: And We left it as a sign. Is there anyone who will be warned?

text: فكيف كان عذابي ونذر
translation: How was then My punishment and My commination!

text: ولقد يسرنا القرآن للذكر فهل من مدكر
translation: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?

text: كذبت عاد فكيف كان عذابي ونذر
translation: The 'Ad had also disavowed. How was then My punishment and My commination!

text: إنا أرسلنا عليهم ريحا صرصرا في يوم نحس مستمر
translation: We let loose against them a violent roaring wind on a day of ill omen, continuous,

text: تنزع الناس كأنهم أعجاز نخل منقعر
translation: Which snatched away men as though they were palm trees pulled out by the roots.

text: فكيف كان عذابي ونذر
translation: How was then My punishment and My commination!

text: ولقد يسرنا القرآن للذكر فهل من مدكر
translation: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will pay heed?

text: كذبت ثمود بالنذر
translation: The Thamud rejected the warnings,

text: فقالوا أبشرا منا واحدا نتبعه إنا إذا لفي ضلال وسعر
translation: And said: "Should we follow only one man among us? In that case we shall he in error and insane.

text: أألقي الذكر عليه من بيننا بل هو كذاب أشر
translation: Was he the one of all of us to have been given the exposition? He is surely an impudent liar."

text: سيعلمون غدا من الكذاب الأشر
translation: "Tomorrow they will know who is the impudent liar!

text: إنا مرسلو الناقة فتنة لهم فارتقبهم واصطبر
translation: We shall send the she-camel to try them. So watch them, and be constant.

text: ونبئهم أن الماء قسمة بينهم ۖ كل شرب محتضر
translation: Tell them that the water is to be apportioned between them (and her); and every turn of drinking will be fixed (for each)."

text: فنادوا صاحبهم فتعاطىٰ فعقر
translation: But they called their commander, who seized and hamstrung her.

text: فكيف كان عذابي ونذر
translation: How was then My punishment of which they had been warned?

text: إنا أرسلنا عليهم صيحة واحدة فكانوا كهشيم المحتظر
translation: We sent a single blast against them, and they were reduced to husks of a decayed fence.

text: ولقد يسرنا القرآن للذكر فهل من مدكر
translation: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?

text: كذبت قوم لوط بالنذر
translation: The people of Lot rejected the warnings.

text: إنا أرسلنا عليهم حاصبا إلا آل لوط ۖ نجيناهم بسحر
translation: We sent a stone-hurtling storm against them, except the family of Lot whom We saved in the early hours of the morning

text: نعمة من عندنا ۚ كذٰلك نجزي من شكر
translation: As a favour from Us. That is how We reward the grateful.

text: ولقد أنذرهم بطشتنا فتماروا بالنذر
translation: He had warned them of Our might, but they passed over the warnings.

text: ولقد راودوه عن ضيفه فطمسنا أعينهم فذوقوا عذابي ونذر
translation: They lusted after his guests, so We put out their eyes (and said): "Taste My punishment and My commination."

text: ولقد صبحهم بكرة عذاب مستقر
translation: And early in the morning the decreed punishment came upon them.

text: فذوقوا عذابي ونذر
translation: So now taste My punishment and My commination!

text: ولقد يسرنا القرآن للذكر فهل من مدكر
translation: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?

text: ولقد جاء آل فرعون النذر
translation: The warnings came to the people of Pharaoh.

text: كذبوا بآياتنا كلها فأخذناهم أخذ عزيز مقتدر
translation: They rejected each one of Our signs. So We seized them with the grip of one mighty and powerful.

text: أكفاركم خير من أولٰئكم أم لكم براءة في الزبر
translation: Are the unbelievers among you any better than they? Or is there immunity for you in the Scriptures?

text: أم يقولون نحن جميع منتصر
translation: Or do they say: "We are a well-accoutred army?"

text: سيهزم الجمع ويولون الدبر
translation: The army will be routed and put to flight.

text: بل الساعة موعدهم والساعة أدهىٰ وأمر
translation: Surely the Hour will be the moment of their promise, and that moment will be calamitous and distressing.

text: إن المجرمين في ضلال وسعر
translation: Surely the sinners are misguided and insane.

text: يوم يسحبون في النار علىٰ وجوههم ذوقوا مس سقر
translation: On that Day they will be dragged into the fire faces foremost, (and told:) "Taste the feel of Hell."

text: إنا كل شيء خلقناه بقدر
translation: We have indeed created all things by measure;

text: وما أمرنا إلا واحدة كلمح بالبصر
translation: And Our command is but one (word) swift as the winking of an eye.

text: ولقد أهلكنا أشياعكم فهل من مدكر
translation: We have destroyed the likes of you in the past: So is there any one who will be warned?

text: وكل شيء فعلوه في الزبر
translation: All things they do are (recorded) in the books;

text: وكل صغير وكبير مستطر
translation: All things small or great have been written down.

text: إن المتقين في جنات ونهر
translation: Surely those who fear God and follow the straight path will be amidst gardens and light,

text: في مقعد صدق عند مليك مقتدر
translation: At the still centre in the proximity of the King all-powerful.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم الرحمٰن
translation: AR-RAHMAN

text: علم القرآن
translation: Bestowed the Qur'an,

text: خلق الإنسان
translation: Created man,

text: علمه البيان
translation: And taught him to express clearly.

text: الشمس والقمر بحسبان
translation: The sun and moon revolve to a computation;

text: والنجم والشجر يسجدان
translation: And the grasses and the trees bow (to Him) in adoration.

text: والسماء رفعها ووضع الميزان
translation: He raised the sky and set the Balance

text: ألا تطغوا في الميزان
translation: So that none may err against the scales,

text: وأقيموا الوزن بالقسط ولا تخسروا الميزان
translation: And observe correct measure, weigh with justice, and not cheat the balance.

text: والأرض وضعها للأنام
translation: He positioned the earth for all the creatures:

text: فيها فاكهة والنخل ذات الأكمام
translation: There are fruits of all kinds on it, and date-palms with their clusters sheathed,

text: والحب ذو العصف والريحان
translation: Grain with husk, and fragrant grasses.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?

text: خلق الإنسان من صلصال كالفخار
translation: He created man of fermented clay dried tinkling hard like earthen ware,

text: وخلق الجان من مارج من نار
translation: And created jinns from the white-hot flame of fire.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: رب المشرقين ورب المغربين
translation: Lord of the two Easts, Lord of the two Wests.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?

text: مرج البحرين يلتقيان
translation: He has set two seas in motion that flow side by side together,

text: بينهما برزخ لا يبغيان
translation: With an interstice between them which they cannot cross.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: يخرج منهما اللؤلؤ والمرجان
translation: Out of them come pearls and coral.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: وله الجوار المنشآت في البحر كالأعلام
translation: His are the high-sailed vessels in deep ocean like the mountains.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?

text: كل من عليها فان
translation: All that is on the earth is passing,

text: ويبقىٰ وجه ربك ذو الجلال والإكرام
translation: But abiding is the glory of your Lord, full of majesty and beneficence.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: يسأله من في السماوات والأرض ۚ كل يوم هو في شأن
translation: All those there are in the heavens and the earth turn to Him with solicitation, intent on His purpose all the time.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: سنفرغ لكم أيه الثقلان
translation: We shall soon be free to turn to you, O weary caravans,

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: يا معشر الجن والإنس إن استطعتم أن تنفذوا من أقطار السماوات والأرض فانفذوا ۚ لا تنفذون إلا بسلطان
translation: O society of jinns and men, cross the bounds of the heavens and the earth if you have the ability, then pass beyond them; but you cannot unless you acquire the law.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: يرسل عليكما شواظ من نار ونحاس فلا تنتصران
translation: Let loose at you will be smokeless flames of fire so that you will not be able to defend yourselves.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?

text: فإذا انشقت السماء فكانت وردة كالدهان
translation: When the sky will split asunder, and turn rosy like the dregs of annointing oil,

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: Which of the favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: فيومئذ لا يسأل عن ذنبه إنس ولا جان
translation: Neither man nor jinn will be questioned on that day about his sin.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: يعرف المجرمون بسيماهم فيؤخذ بالنواصي والأقدام
translation: The sinners will be recognised by their marks, and seized by the forelock and their feet.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: Which of the favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: هٰذه جهنم التي يكذب بها المجرمون
translation: This is Hell the sinners called a lie.

text: يطوفون بينها وبين حميم آن
translation: They will go round and around between it and boiling water.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: Which of the favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: ولمن خاف مقام ربه جنتان
translation: But for him who lived in awe of the sublimity of his Lord, there will be two gardens --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: ذواتا أفنان
translation: Full of overhanging branches --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: Which of the favours of your Lord will you then deny? --

text: فيهما عينان تجريان
translation: With two springs of water flowing through them both. --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?

text: فيهما من كل فاكهة زوجان
translation: In both of them there will be every kind of fruits in pairs. --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: متكئين علىٰ فرش بطائنها من إستبرق ۚ وجنى الجنتين دان
translation: Reclining there on carpets lined with brocade, fruits of the garden hanging low within reach.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?

text: فيهن قاصرات الطرف لم يطمثهن إنس قبلهم ولا جان
translation: In them maidens with averted glances, undeflowered by man or by jinn before them, --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: كأنهن الياقوت والمرجان
translation: As though rubies and pearls.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?

text: هل جزاء الإحسان إلا الإحسان
translation: Should the reward of goodness be aught else but goodness? --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: ومن دونهما جنتان
translation: And besides these two other gardens --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: مدهامتان
translation: Of darkest verdant green --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: فيهما عينان نضاختان
translation: With two fountains gushing constantly, --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: فيهما فاكهة ونخل ورمان
translation: With fruits in them, and dates and pomegranates --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: فيهن خيرات حسان
translation: In them good and comely maidens --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny? --

text: حور مقصورات في الخيام
translation: Houris cloistered in pavilions --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny? --

text: لم يطمثهن إنس قبلهم ولا جان
translation: Undeflowered by man or by jinn before them, --

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --

text: متكئين علىٰ رفرف خضر وعبقري حسان
translation: Reclining on green cushions and rich carpets excellent.

text: فبأي آلاء ربكما تكذبان
translation: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

text: تبارك اسم ربك ذي الجلال والإكرام
translation: Blessed be the name of your Lord, full of majesty and beneficience.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم إذا وقعت الواقعة
translation: WHEN WHAT IS to happen comes to pass --

text: ليس لوقعتها كاذبة
translation: Which is bound to happen undoubtedly --

text: خافضة رافعة
translation: Degrading (some) and exalting (others);

text: إذا رجت الأرض رجا
translation: When the earth is shaken up convulsively,

text: وبست الجبال بسا
translation: The mountains bruised and crushed,

text: فكانت هباء منبثا
translation: Turned to dust, floating in the air,

text: وكنتم أزواجا ثلاثة
translation: You will become three categories:

text: فأصحاب الميمنة ما أصحاب الميمنة
translation: Those of the right hand -- how (happy) will be those of the right hand!

text: وأصحاب المشأمة ما أصحاب المشأمة
translation: Then those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) will be those of the left hand!

text: والسابقون السابقون
translation: Then the foremost, how pre-excellent,

text: أولٰئك المقربون
translation: Who will be honoured

text: في جنات النعيم
translation: In gardens of tranquility;

text: ثلة من الأولين
translation: A number of the earlier peoples,

text: وقليل من الآخرين
translation: And a few of later ages,

text: علىٰ سرر موضونة
translation: On couches wrought of gold,

text: متكئين عليها متقابلين
translation: Reclining face to face.

text: يطوف عليهم ولدان مخلدون
translation: Youths of never-ending bloom will pass round to them

text: بأكواب وأباريق وكأس من معين
translation: Cups and decanters, beakers full of sparkling wine,

text: لا يصدعون عنها ولا ينزفون
translation: Unheady, uninebriating;

text: وفاكهة مما يتخيرون
translation: And such fruits as they fancy,

text: ولحم طير مما يشتهون
translation: Bird meats that they relish,

text: وحور عين
translation: And companions with big beautiful eyes

text: كأمثال اللؤلؤ المكنون
translation: Like pearls within their shells,

text: جزاء بما كانوا يعملون
translation: As recompense for all they had done.

text: لا يسمعون فيها لغوا ولا تأثيما
translation: They will hear no nonsense there or talk of sin,

text: إلا قيلا سلاما سلاما
translation: Other than "Peace, peace" the salutation.

text: وأصحاب اليمين ما أصحاب اليمين
translation: As for those of the right hand -- how (happy) those of the right hand --

text: في سدر مخضود
translation: They will be in (the shade) of thornless lote

text: وطلح منضود
translation: And acacia covered with heaps of bloom,

text: وظل ممدود
translation: Lengthened shadows,

text: وماء مسكوب
translation: Gushing water,

text: وفاكهة كثيرة
translation: And fruits numberless,

text: لا مقطوعة ولا ممنوعة
translation: Unending, unforbidden,

text: وفرش مرفوعة
translation: And maidens incomparable.

text: إنا أنشأناهن إنشاء
translation: We have formed them in a distinctive fashion,

text: فجعلناهن أبكارا
translation: And made them virginal,

text: عربا أترابا
translation: Loving companions matched in age,

text: لأصحاب اليمين
translation: For those of the right hand.

text: ثلة من الأولين
translation: A crowd of earlier generations

text: وثلة من الآخرين
translation: And a crowd of the later.

text: وأصحاب الشمال ما أصحاب الشمال
translation: But those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) those of the left hand --

text: في سموم وحميم
translation: Will be in the scorching wind and boiling water,

text: وظل من يحموم
translation: Under the shadow of thick black smoke

text: لا بارد ولا كريم
translation: Neither cool nor agreeable.

text: إنهم كانوا قبل ذٰلك مترفين
translation: They were endowed with good things

text: وكانوا يصرون على الحنث العظيم
translation: But persisted in that greater sin,

text: وكانوا يقولون أئذا متنا وكنا ترابا وعظاما أإنا لمبعوثون
translation: And said: "What! When we are dead and turned to dust and bones, shall we then be raised again?

text: أوآباؤنا الأولون
translation: And so will our fathers?"

text: قل إن الأولين والآخرين
translation: Say: "Indeed, the earlier and the later generations

text: لمجموعون إلىٰ ميقات يوم معلوم
translation: Will be gathered together on a certain day which is predetermined.

text: ثم إنكم أيها الضالون المكذبون
translation: Then you, the erring and the deniers,

text: لآكلون من شجر من زقوم
translation: Will eat of the tree of Zaqqum,

text: فمالئون منها البطون
translation: Fill your bellies with it,

text: فشاربون عليه من الحميم
translation: And drink over it scalding water,

text: فشاربون شرب الهيم
translation: Lapping it up like female camels raging of thirst with disease."

text: هٰذا نزلهم يوم الدين
translation: Such will be their welcome on the Day of Judgement.

text: نحن خلقناكم فلولا تصدقون
translation: It is He who created you, then why do you not affirm the truth?

text: أفرأيتم ما تمنون
translation: Just consider (the semen) that you emit,

text: أأنتم تخلقونه أم نحن الخالقون
translation: Do you create it, or We are its creator?

text: نحن قدرنا بينكم الموت وما نحن بمسبوقين
translation: We have incorporated death in your constitution, and We shall not be hindered

text: علىٰ أن نبدل أمثالكم وننشئكم في ما لا تعلمون
translation: From replacing you with others or raising you in a way you do not know.

text: ولقد علمتم النشأة الأولىٰ فلولا تذكرون
translation: You have known the first creation, then why do you not reflect?

text: أفرأيتم ما تحرثون
translation: Just ponder over what you sow:

text: أأنتم تزرعونه أم نحن الزارعون
translation: Do you give it its increase, or are We the giver?

text: لو نشاء لجعلناه حطاما فظلتم تفكهون
translation: We could turn it, if We pleased, into straw; then you would rue the day,

text: إنا لمغرمون
translation: (And say:) "We have fallen into debt;

text: بل نحن محرومون
translation: Indeed, we have been deprived of the fruits of our labour."

text: أفرأيتم الماء الذي تشربون
translation: Consider the water that you drink.

text: أأنتم أنزلتموه من المزن أم نحن المنزلون
translation: Do you send it down from the clouds, or We send it down?

text: لو نشاء جعلناه أجاجا فلولا تشكرون
translation: We could make it brackish, if We pleased; so why do you not acknowledge thanks?

text: أفرأيتم النار التي تورون
translation: Consider the fire that you strike (and get by friction).

text: أأنتم أنشأتم شجرتها أم نحن المنشئون
translation: Have you raised its tree, or We have raised it?

text: نحن جعلناها تذكرة ومتاعا للمقوين
translation: We have made it as a reminder and convenience for the needy.

text: فسبح باسم ربك العظيم
translation: So glorify your Lord, the most supreme.

text: فلا أقسم بمواقع النجوم
translation: So I call the placement of the stars to witness --

text: وإنه لقسم لو تعلمون عظيم
translation: And this surely is great evidence if you can understand --

text: إنه لقرآن كريم
translation: That this is indeed the glorious Qur'an

text: في كتاب مكنون
translation: (Inscribed) in the well-kept Book.

text: لا يمسه إلا المطهرون
translation: Only they can reach it who are clean (of mind).

text: تنزيل من رب العالمين
translation: It has been revealed by the Lord of all the worlds.

text: أفبهٰذا الحديث أنتم مدهنون
translation: Then why do you dissimulate this Revelation?

text: وتجعلون رزقكم أنكم تكذبون
translation: You live by calling it a lie.

text: فلولا إذا بلغت الحلقوم
translation: Then how is it that when the (dying) breath is withdrawn into the throat (and rattles),

text: وأنتم حينئذ تنظرون
translation: And you wait for the moment (of death),

text: ونحن أقرب إليه منكم ولٰكن لا تبصرون
translation: We are closer to him than you, even though you cannot see?

text: فلولا إن كنتم غير مدينين
translation: Then why, if you are not indebted (to Us for life),

text: ترجعونها إن كنتم صادقين
translation: Can you not bring him back? (Answer) if you are truthful

text: فأما إن كان من المقربين
translation: Then, if he is one of the honoured,

text: فروح وريحان وجنت نعيم
translation: There will be peace and plenty, and gardens of tranquility for him.

text: وأما إن كان من أصحاب اليمين
translation: If he is of those of the right hand,

text: فسلام لك من أصحاب اليمين
translation: There will be the salutation by those of the right hand: "Peace on you.

text: وأما إن كان من المكذبين الضالين
translation: But if he is of the deniers and the errants,

text: فنزل من حميم
translation: The welcome will be boiling water

text: وتصلية جحيم
translation: And the roasting in Hell.

text: إن هٰذا لهو حق اليقين
translation: This is indeed the ultimate truth.

text: فسبح باسم ربك العظيم
translation: Then praise your Lord, the most supreme.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم سبح لله ما في السماوات والأرض ۖ وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation: WHATSOEVER IS IN the heavens and the earth sings the praises of God. He is all-mighty and all-wise.

text: له ملك السماوات والأرض ۖ يحيي ويميت ۖ وهو علىٰ كل شيء قدير
translation: His is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, He is the giver of life and death, and He has power over everything.

text: هو الأول والآخر والظاهر والباطن ۖ وهو بكل شيء عليم
translation: He is the first and He the last, the transcendent and the immanent; and He has knowledge of everything.

text: هو الذي خلق السماوات والأرض في ستة أيام ثم استوىٰ على العرش ۚ يعلم ما يلج في الأرض وما يخرج منها وما ينزل من السماء وما يعرج فيها ۖ وهو معكم أين ما كنتم ۚ والله بما تعملون بصير
translation: It is He who created the heavens and the earth in six stages, then assumed the throne. He knows whatsoever enters the earth, and whatsoever comes out of it, and what comes down from the sky and what goes up to it; and He is with you wheresoever you may be, and He perceives whatsoever you do.

text: له ملك السماوات والأرض ۚ وإلى الله ترجع الأمور
translation: His is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and all things will go back to Him.

text: يولج الليل في النهار ويولج النهار في الليل ۚ وهو عليم بذات الصدور
translation: He turns night into day, and turns day into night; and He knows whatsoever is in your hearts.

text: آمنوا بالله ورسوله وأنفقوا مما جعلكم مستخلفين فيه ۖ فالذين آمنوا منكم وأنفقوا لهم أجر كبير
translation: Believe in God and His Apostle, and spend of what He has given you as His trustee. And those of you who believe and spend in charity will have a great reward.

text: وما لكم لا تؤمنون بالله ۙ والرسول يدعوكم لتؤمنوا بربكم وقد أخذ ميثاقكم إن كنتم مؤمنين
translation: What has come upon you that you believe not in God, though the Prophet is calling you to believe in your Lord? And He has already taken your pledge, if you are believers.

text: هو الذي ينزل علىٰ عبده آيات بينات ليخرجكم من الظلمات إلى النور ۚ وإن الله بكم لرءوف رحيم
translation: It is He who sends down splendent revelations to His votary that he may take you out of darkness into light; for surely God is gracious and kind to you.

text: وما لكم ألا تنفقوا في سبيل الله ولله ميراث السماوات والأرض ۚ لا يستوي منكم من أنفق من قبل الفتح وقاتل ۚ أولٰئك أعظم درجة من الذين أنفقوا من بعد وقاتلوا ۚ وكلا وعد الله الحسنىٰ ۚ والله بما تعملون خبير
translation: What has come upon you that you do not spend in the way of God, when the heritage of the heavens and the earth belongs to God? Those of you who spent before the victory and fought, are not equal (to those who did not). They are higher in position than those who spent after (the victory) and fought. To each one God has made the promise of excellence, for God is aware of all you do.

text: من ذا الذي يقرض الله قرضا حسنا فيضاعفه له وله أجر كريم
translation: Who will give a goodly loan to God which He will double for him, and be for him a splendid reward?

text: يوم ترى المؤمنين والمؤمنات يسعىٰ نورهم بين أيديهم وبأيمانهم بشراكم اليوم جنات تجري من تحتها الأنهار خالدين فيها ۚ ذٰلك هو الفوز العظيم
translation: The day you see the believers, men and women, with their light advancing ahead and to the right of them, (they will be told:) "There is good news for you this day, of gardens with rivers flowing by where you will live for ever." This will be the great attainment.

text: يوم يقول المنافقون والمنافقات للذين آمنوا انظرونا نقتبس من نوركم قيل ارجعوا وراءكم فالتمسوا نورا فضرب بينهم بسور له باب باطنه فيه الرحمة وظاهره من قبله العذاب
translation: The day the hypocrites, men and women, will say to the believers: "Wait for us that we may borrow a little light from your light," they will be told: "Go back, and look for your light." A wall shall be raised between them in which there will be a door. Within it will be benevolence and retribution without.

text: ينادونهم ألم نكن معكم ۖ قالوا بلىٰ ولٰكنكم فتنتم أنفسكم وتربصتم وارتبتم وغرتكم الأماني حتىٰ جاء أمر الله وغركم بالله الغرور
translation: They will call to them: "Were we not with you?" They will answer: "Certainly; but then you let yourselves be tempted, and waited in expectation but were suspicious and were deceived by vain desires, till the decree of God came to pass, and the deceiver duped you in respect of God.

text: فاليوم لا يؤخذ منكم فدية ولا من الذين كفروا ۚ مأواكم النار ۖ هي مولاكم ۖ وبئس المصير
translation: So no ransom will be accepted of you on this day, or of those who refused to believe. Hell will be your refuge and the only friend -- and how evil a destination!"

text: ألم يأن للذين آمنوا أن تخشع قلوبهم لذكر الله وما نزل من الحق ولا يكونوا كالذين أوتوا الكتاب من قبل فطال عليهم الأمد فقست قلوبهم ۖ وكثير منهم فاسقون
translation: Has the moment not yet come when the hearts of believers should be moved by the thought of God and the truth that has been sent down, so that they should not be like those who received the Book before them but whose hearts were hardened after a lapse of time, and many of them turned disobedient?

text: اعلموا أن الله يحيي الأرض بعد موتها ۚ قد بينا لكم الآيات لعلكم تعقلون
translation: Know that God enlivens the earth even after it has died. We have explained to you clearly Our signs that you may understand.

text: إن المصدقين والمصدقات وأقرضوا الله قرضا حسنا يضاعف لهم ولهم أجر كريم
translation: Surely the men and women who spend in charity and give a goodly loan to God, will have it doubled for them and will receive a generous reward.

text: والذين آمنوا بالله ورسله أولٰئك هم الصديقون ۖ والشهداء عند ربهم لهم أجرهم ونورهم ۖ والذين كفروا وكذبوا بآياتنا أولٰئك أصحاب الجحيم
translation: Those who believe in God and His apostles are true of word and deed; and by their Lord are considered testifiers of the truth. They have their guerdon and their light. As for those who do not believe and reject Our revelations, are the people of Hell.

text: اعلموا أنما الحياة الدنيا لعب ولهو وزينة وتفاخر بينكم وتكاثر في الأموال والأولاد ۖ كمثل غيث أعجب الكفار نباته ثم يهيج فتراه مصفرا ثم يكون حطاما ۖ وفي الآخرة عذاب شديد ومغفرة من الله ورضوان ۚ وما الحياة الدنيا إلا متاع الغرور
translation: Know that the life of this world is only a frolic and mummery, an ornamentation, boasting and bragging among yourselves, and lust for multiplying wealth and children. It is like rain so pleasing to the cultivator for his vegetation which sprouts and swells, and then begins to wither, and you see it turn to yellow and reduced to chaff. There is severe punishment in the Hereafter, but also forgiveness from God, and acceptance. As for the life of this world, it is no more than merchandise of vanity.

text: سابقوا إلىٰ مغفرة من ربكم وجنة عرضها كعرض السماء والأرض أعدت للذين آمنوا بالله ورسله ۚ ذٰلك فضل الله يؤتيه من يشاء ۚ والله ذو الفضل العظيم
translation: Hasten for the forgiveness of your Lord and Paradise whose expanse is as wide as that of the heavens and the earth, which has been prepared for those who believe in God and His apostles. This is the bounty of God which He bestows on whosoever He please; and the bounty of God is infinite.

text: ما أصاب من مصيبة في الأرض ولا في أنفسكم إلا في كتاب من قبل أن نبرأها ۚ إن ذٰلك على الله يسير
translation: There is no calamity that befalls the earth or your own selves but in accordance with the law (of causation) before We make it evident. This is indeed how the law of God works inevitably.

text: لكيلا تأسوا علىٰ ما فاتكم ولا تفرحوا بما آتاكم ۗ والله لا يحب كل مختال فخور
translation: Lest you grieve for what you missed, or rejoice at what you received. God does not love the egoist and the braggart,

text: الذين يبخلون ويأمرون الناس بالبخل ۗ ومن يتول فإن الله هو الغني الحميد
translation: Who hold back what they possess and enjoin stinginess on others. Whoever turns away (from God, should remember) that God is self-sufficient, worthy of praise.

text: لقد أرسلنا رسلنا بالبينات وأنزلنا معهم الكتاب والميزان ليقوم الناس بالقسط ۖ وأنزلنا الحديد فيه بأس شديد ومنافع للناس وليعلم الله من ينصره ورسله بالغيب ۚ إن الله قوي عزيز
translation: We have surely sent apostles with clear signs, and sent with them the Book and the Balance, so that men may stand by justice; and We sent down iron which causes much distress but also has advantages for men, so that God may know who helps Him and His apostles in secret. Verily God is all-powerful and all-mighty.

text: ولقد أرسلنا نوحا وإبراهيم وجعلنا في ذريتهما النبوة والكتاب ۖ فمنهم مهتد ۖ وكثير منهم فاسقون
translation: We sent Noah and Abraham, and gave prophethood to their progeny and the Book, and some of them are well-directed, but many of them are disobedient.

text: ثم قفينا علىٰ آثارهم برسلنا وقفينا بعيسى ابن مريم وآتيناه الإنجيل وجعلنا في قلوب الذين اتبعوه رأفة ورحمة ورهبانية ابتدعوها ما كتبناها عليهم إلا ابتغاء رضوان الله فما رعوها حق رعايتها ۖ فآتينا الذين آمنوا منهم أجرهم ۖ وكثير منهم فاسقون
translation: Then in their train We sent Our apostles, and succeeding them Jesus, son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel, and put into the hearts of his followers compassion and kindness. But they created monasticism which had not been prescribed for them by Us except for seeking the pleasure of God; yet they did not observe it as it should have been rightly observed. So We gave those among them who were believers their reward; but most of them are disobedient.

text: يا أيها الذين آمنوا اتقوا الله وآمنوا برسوله يؤتكم كفلين من رحمته ويجعل لكم نورا تمشون به ويغفر لكم ۚ والله غفور رحيم
translation: O you who believe, have fear of displeasing God, and believe in His Prophet. He will give you twice as much of His bounty and place a light for you to walk in, and forgive you, for God is forgiving and kind;

text: لئلا يعلم أهل الكتاب ألا يقدرون علىٰ شيء من فضل الله ۙ وأن الفضل بيد الله يؤتيه من يشاء ۚ والله ذو الفضل العظيم
translation: So that the people of the Book may know that they have not the least power over the bounty of God, and that the bounty is wholly in the hands of God to give whosoever He please, for God is the master of infinite bounty.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم قد سمع الله قول التي تجادلك في زوجها وتشتكي إلى الله والله يسمع تحاوركما ۚ إن الله سميع بصير
translation: GOD CERTAINLY HEARD what the woman who argued with you about her husband, said, and complained to God; and God heard your interrogation. Verily God hears all, and sees everything.

text: الذين يظاهرون منكم من نسائهم ما هن أمهاتهم ۖ إن أمهاتهم إلا اللائي ولدنهم ۚ وإنهم ليقولون منكرا من القول وزورا ۚ وإن الله لعفو غفور
translation: Those of you who divorce your wives by calling them 'mothers,' cannot (make them) their mothers. Their mothers are only those who gave birth to them. They surely utter what is unseemly and a lie. But God is forbearing and forgiving.

text: والذين يظاهرون من نسائهم ثم يعودون لما قالوا فتحرير رقبة من قبل أن يتماسا ۚ ذٰلكم توعظون به ۚ والله بما تعملون خبير
translation: Those who call their wives their mothers then revoke what they had said, should free a slave before having physical contact (with them). This is to warn you, as God is aware of what you do.

text: فمن لم يجد فصيام شهرين متتابعين من قبل أن يتماسا ۖ فمن لم يستطع فإطعام ستين مسكينا ۚ ذٰلك لتؤمنوا بالله ورسوله ۚ وتلك حدود الله ۗ وللكافرين عذاب أليم
translation: If one does not have the means (of doing so) then he should fast for two months continuously before he has physical contact; but any one who is unable to do so, should feed sixty needy persons. This (is enjoined) so that you may be faithful to God and His Apostle. These are the limits set by God. As for the unbelievers, there is painful punishment for them.

text: إن الذين يحادون الله ورسوله كبتوا كما كبت الذين من قبلهم ۚ وقد أنزلنا آيات بينات ۚ وللكافرين عذاب مهين
translation: Those who oppose God will be disgraced, as those before them were. We have sent down very clear signs. For unbelievers there is a shameful punishment.

text: يوم يبعثهم الله جميعا فينبئهم بما عملوا ۚ أحصاه الله ونسوه ۚ والله علىٰ كل شيء شهيد
translation: On the day when God will raise them up together, He will tell them what they did. God takes account of it although they forget, for all things are evident to God.

text: ألم تر أن الله يعلم ما في السماوات وما في الأرض ۖ ما يكون من نجوىٰ ثلاثة إلا هو رابعهم ولا خمسة إلا هو سادسهم ولا أدنىٰ من ذٰلك ولا أكثر إلا هو معهم أين ما كانوا ۖ ثم ينبئهم بما عملوا يوم القيامة ۚ إن الله بكل شيء عليم
translation: Have you not considered that God knows whatever is in the heavens and the earth? No three persons confer secretly but He is the fourth among them, and no five but He is the sixth; and neither fewer nor more but He is with them wheresoever they be. And on the Day of Judgement He will announce their deeds to them. Verily God has knowledge of everything.

text: ألم تر إلى الذين نهوا عن النجوىٰ ثم يعودون لما نهوا عنه ويتناجون بالإثم والعدوان ومعصيت الرسول وإذا جاءوك حيوك بما لم يحيك به الله ويقولون في أنفسهم لولا يعذبنا الله بما نقول ۚ حسبهم جهنم يصلونها ۖ فبئس المصير
translation: Have you not considered those who were forbidden to conspire, but reverted after a time to what was forbidden them, and conspired evil, rebellion and disobedience to the Prophet? Yet when they come to you they greet you with a greeting even God does not greet you with; and say to themselves, "Why doesn't God punish us for what we say?" Hell is sufficient for them, in which they will be burnt: And what an evil consequence!

text: يا أيها الذين آمنوا إذا تناجيتم فلا تتناجوا بالإثم والعدوان ومعصيت الرسول وتناجوا بالبر والتقوىٰ ۖ واتقوا الله الذي إليه تحشرون
translation: O you who believe, when you converse privately, do not talk of iniquity, rebellion, and disobedience to the Prophet, but talk of goodness and piety, and fear God before whom you will be gathered.

text: إنما النجوىٰ من الشيطان ليحزن الذين آمنوا وليس بضارهم شيئا إلا بإذن الله ۚ وعلى الله فليتوكل المؤمنون
translation: Surely scheming is the work of Satan that he may cause the faithful grief; but he cannot harm them unless God dispense. So in God should the believers place their trust.

text: يا أيها الذين آمنوا إذا قيل لكم تفسحوا في المجالس فافسحوا يفسح الله لكم ۖ وإذا قيل انشزوا فانشزوا يرفع الله الذين آمنوا منكم والذين أوتوا العلم درجات ۚ والله بما تعملون خبير
translation: O you who believe, when you are told to make room in the assemblies, then make room; God will give you more room to spread. When you are told to rise, then rise; God will raise those of you who believe, and those who have knowledge, in position. God is aware of what you do.

text: يا أيها الذين آمنوا إذا ناجيتم الرسول فقدموا بين يدي نجواكم صدقة ۚ ذٰلك خير لكم وأطهر ۚ فإن لم تجدوا فإن الله غفور رحيم
translation: O you who believe, if you confer with the Prophet in private, give alms in the name of God before you go to confer. This is better for you and becoming. If you do not have the means, then surely God is forgiving and kind.

text: أأشفقتم أن تقدموا بين يدي نجواكم صدقات ۚ فإذ لم تفعلوا وتاب الله عليكم فأقيموا الصلاة وآتوا الزكاة وأطيعوا الله ورسوله ۚ والله خبير بما تعملون
translation: Are you afraid of giving alms before confering? Then, if you cannot do this, and God forgives you, be constant in your devotional obligations and pay the due share of your wealth for the welfare of others, and obey God and His Prophet. God is aware of all you do.

text: ألم تر إلى الذين تولوا قوما غضب الله عليهم ما هم منكم ولا منهم ويحلفون على الكذب وهم يعلمون
translation: Have you not seen those who have taken a people who have roused the wrath of God, as friends? They are neither of you nor of them, and swear to a lie, and knowingly.

text: أعد الله لهم عذابا شديدا ۖ إنهم ساء ما كانوا يعملون
translation: God has reserved a severe punishment for them. Evil indeed are the things they do!

text: اتخذوا أيمانهم جنة فصدوا عن سبيل الله فلهم عذاب مهين
translation: They have made their oaths a shield, and obstruct people from the way of God. There is shameful punishment for them.

text: لن تغني عنهم أموالهم ولا أولادهم من الله شيئا ۚ أولٰئك أصحاب النار ۖ هم فيها خالدون
translation: Neither their wealth nor children will avail them against God. They are the people of Hell, and there will abide for ever.

text: يوم يبعثهم الله جميعا فيحلفون له كما يحلفون لكم ۖ ويحسبون أنهم علىٰ شيء ۚ ألا إنهم هم الكاذبون
translation: On the day that God will raise them together, they will swear before Him as they swear before you, and imagine they are on the right path. Is it not they who are liars?

text: استحوذ عليهم الشيطان فأنساهم ذكر الله ۚ أولٰئك حزب الشيطان ۚ ألا إن حزب الشيطان هم الخاسرون
translation: Satan has got the better of them. and made them forget to remember God. Indeed they belong to Satan's faction. Will not Satan's faction perish?

text: إن الذين يحادون الله ورسوله أولٰئك في الأذلين
translation: Surely those who oppose God and His Prophet will be among the vilest.

text: كتب الله لأغلبن أنا ورسلي ۚ إن الله قوي عزيز
translation: God has decreed: "I will prevail, I and My apostles." Verily God is powerful and all-mighty.

text: لا تجد قوما يؤمنون بالله واليوم الآخر يوادون من حاد الله ورسوله ولو كانوا آباءهم أو أبناءهم أو إخوانهم أو عشيرتهم ۚ أولٰئك كتب في قلوبهم الإيمان وأيدهم بروح منه ۖ ويدخلهم جنات تجري من تحتها الأنهار خالدين فيها ۚ رضي الله عنهم ورضوا عنه ۚ أولٰئك حزب الله ۚ ألا إن حزب الله هم المفلحون
