translation: Surely the devotees will drink cups flavoured with palm blossoms

text: عينا يشرب بها عباد الله يفجرونها تفجيرا
translation: From a spring of which the votaries of God will drink and make it flow in abundance.

text: يوفون بالنذر ويخافون يوما كان شره مستطيرا
translation: Those who fulfil their vows and fear the Day whose evil shall be diffused far and wide,

text: ويطعمون الطعام علىٰ حبه مسكينا ويتيما وأسيرا
translation: And feed the needy for the love of Him, and the orphans and the captives,

text: إنما نطعمكم لوجه الله لا نريد منكم جزاء ولا شكورا
translation: (Saying): "We feed you for the sake of God, desiring neither recompense nor thanks.

text: إنا نخاف من ربنا يوما عبوسا قمطريرا
translation: We fear the dismal day calamitous from our Lord."

text: فوقاهم الله شر ذٰلك اليوم ولقاهم نضرة وسرورا
translation: So God will protect them from the evil of that day, and grant them happiness and joy,

text: وجزاهم بما صبروا جنة وحريرا
translation: And reward them for their perseverence Paradise and silken robes,

text: متكئين فيها على الأرائك ۖ لا يرون فيها شمسا ولا زمهريرا
translation: Where they will recline on couches feeling neither heat of the sun nor intense cold.

text: ودانية عليهم ظلالها وذللت قطوفها تذليلا
translation: The shadows will bend over them, and low will hang the clusters of grapes.

text: ويطاف عليهم بآنية من فضة وأكواب كانت قواريرا
translation: Passed round will be silver flagons and goblets made of glass,

text: قوارير من فضة قدروها تقديرا
translation: And crystal clear bottles of silver, of which they will determine the measure themselves.

text: ويسقون فيها كأسا كان مزاجها زنجبيلا
translation: There will they drink a cup flavoured with ginger

text: عينا فيها تسمىٰ سلسبيلا
translation: From a spring by the name of Ever-flowing-Salsabil.

text: ويطوف عليهم ولدان مخلدون إذا رأيتهم حسبتهم لؤلؤا منثورا
translation: And boys of everlasting youth will go about attending them. Looking at them you would think that they were pearls dispersed.

text: وإذا رأيت ثم رأيت نعيما وملكا كبيرا
translation: When you look around, you will see delights and great dominion.

text: عاليهم ثياب سندس خضر وإستبرق ۖ وحلوا أساور من فضة وسقاهم ربهم شرابا طهورا
translation: On their bodies will be garments of the finest green silk and brocade, and they will be adorned with bracelets of silver; and their Lord will give them a purest draught to drink.

text: إن هٰذا كان لكم جزاء وكان سعيكم مشكورا
translation: "This in truth is your recompense, and acceptance of your endeavours."

text: إنا نحن نزلنا عليك القرآن تنزيلا
translation: We have revealed the Qur'an to you gradually;

text: فاصبر لحكم ربك ولا تطع منهم آثما أو كفورا
translation: So wait for your Lord's command, and do not follow any sinner or disbeliever among them.

text: واذكر اسم ربك بكرة وأصيلا
translation: Meditate upon the name of your Lord morning and evening;

text: ومن الليل فاسجد له وسبحه ليلا طويلا
translation: And bow in homage part of the night, and glorify Him far into the night.

text: إن هٰؤلاء يحبون العاجلة ويذرون وراءهم يوما ثقيلا
translation: Surely men love what hastes away and forget the grievous day (ahead).

text: نحن خلقناهم وشددنا أسرهم ۖ وإذا شئنا بدلنا أمثالهم تبديلا
translation: We created them and fixed their bones and joints; and We could replace them when We like with others like them.

text: إن هٰذه تذكرة ۖ فمن شاء اتخذ إلىٰ ربه سبيلا
translation: This surely is a reminder: Therefore whosoever desires may take the way to his Lord.

text: وما تشاءون إلا أن يشاء الله ۚ إن الله كان عليما حكيما
translation: But you will not desire except as God wills. Verily He is all-knowing and all-wise.

text: يدخل من يشاء في رحمته ۚ والظالمين أعد لهم عذابا أليما
translation: He admits whosoever He will to His benevolence. But for the evil-doers He has prepared a painful punishment.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والمرسلات عرفا
translation: I CALL TO WITNESS those who are sent consecutively,

text: فالعاصفات عصفا
translation: And those that strike violently,

text: والناشرات نشرا
translation: And those that revive by quickening,

text: فالفارقات فرقا
translation: And those that distinguish distinctly,

text: فالملقيات ذكرا
translation: And those that bring down the Reminder

text: عذرا أو نذرا
translation: To end all argument or to warn.

text: إنما توعدون لواقع
translation: What is promised will surely come to pass.

text: فإذا النجوم طمست
translation: When the stars are obliterated,

text: وإذا السماء فرجت
translation: The heavens split asunder,

text: وإذا الجبال نسفت
translation: The mountains reduced to dust and blown away,

text: وإذا الرسل أقتت
translation: And when the time comes for raising the little girls (buried alive) --

text: لأي يوم أجلت
translation: For what day is that time fixed?

text: ليوم الفصل
translation: The Day of Judgement.

text: وما أدراك ما يوم الفصل
translation: How will you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: ألم نهلك الأولين
translation: Have We not destroyed the earlier generations?

text: ثم نتبعهم الآخرين
translation: So shall We make the later ones to follow them.

text: كذٰلك نفعل بالمجرمين
translation: That is what We shall do to those who are guilty of crime.

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: ألم نخلقكم من ماء مهين
translation: Did We not create you from contemptible water?

text: فجعلناه في قرار مكين
translation: Then We lodged you in a secure place (the womb)

text: إلىٰ قدر معلوم
translation: For a certain appointed time,

text: فقدرنا فنعم القادرون
translation: Then We facilitated (your birth). How well do We calculate!

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: ألم نجعل الأرض كفاتا
translation: Have We not made the earth a repository

text: أحياء وأمواتا
translation: For the living and the dead,

text: وجعلنا فيها رواسي شامخات وأسقيناكم ماء فراتا
translation: And placed in it lofty and broad stablisers, and gave you sweet water to drink?

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: انطلقوا إلىٰ ما كنتم به تكذبون
translation: "Go to what you used to deny;

text: انطلقوا إلىٰ ظل ذي ثلاث شعب
translation: Go to the shadow with three ramifications,

text: لا ظليل ولا يغني من اللهب
translation: Neither shady nor protecting against the blazing Fire.

text: إنها ترمي بشرر كالقصر
translation: It will throw out sparks as logs of wood

text: كأنه جمالت صفر
translation: So like golden camels."

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: هٰذا يوم لا ينطقون
translation: They will not be able to speak that day,

text: ولا يؤذن لهم فيعتذرون
translation: Nor given leave to make excuses.

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: هٰذا يوم الفصل ۖ جمعناكم والأولين
translation: That will be the Day of Reckoning. Gathered will be (you) and the earlier (generations).

text: فإن كان لكم كيد فكيدون
translation: So if you have any plot to devise against Me, then devise it.

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: إن المتقين في ظلال وعيون
translation: Those who take heed for themselves and fear God, will be amidst shade and springs of water,

text: وفواكه مما يشتهون
translation: And such fruits as they desire.

text: كلوا واشربوا هنيئا بما كنتم تعملون
translation: "Eat and drink with relish as reward for what you had done."

text: إنا كذٰلك نجزي المحسنين
translation: That is how We reward the good.

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: كلوا وتمتعوا قليلا إنكم مجرمون
translation: Eat and enjoy for a while: You are certainly sinners.

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: وإذا قيل لهم اركعوا لا يركعون
translation: When it is said to them: "Bow in homage," they do not bow.

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!

text: فبأي حديث بعده يؤمنون
translation: In what other lore after this will they then believe?

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم عم يتساءلون
translation: OF WHAT ARE they asking one another?

text: عن النبإ العظيم
translation: (Is it) of the great announcement

text: الذي هم فيه مختلفون
translation: About which they have been differing?

text: كلا سيعلمون
translation: Indeed they will come to know soon;

text: ثم كلا سيعلمون
translation: They will indeed come to know soon.

text: ألم نجعل الأرض مهادا
translation: Did We not make the earth a spreading,

text: والجبال أوتادا
translation: The mountains tent-pins?

text: وخلقناكم أزواجا
translation: We created you in pairs,

text: وجعلنا نومكم سباتا
translation: And made sleep for you to rest,

text: وجعلنا الليل لباسا
translation: The night a covering,

text: وجعلنا النهار معاشا
translation: And the day for seeking livelihood.

text: وبنينا فوقكم سبعا شدادا
translation: We raised over you several secure (skies),

text: وجعلنا سراجا وهاجا
translation: And placed a lamp therein brightly burning.

text: وأنزلنا من المعصرات ماء ثجاجا
translation: And We sent down rain from water-laden clouds pouring in torrents

text: لنخرج به حبا ونباتا
translation: That We may produce from it grain and vegetation,

text: وجنات ألفافا
translation: And orchards full of trees and interlacing boughs.

text: إن يوم الفصل كان ميقاتا
translation: Surely a time is fixed for the Day of Judgement.

text: يوم ينفخ في الصور فتأتون أفواجا
translation: The day the trumpet blast is sounded you will come in hordes;

text: وفتحت السماء فكانت أبوابا
translation: The heavens will be opened wide and turn into so many doors,

text: وسيرت الجبال فكانت سرابا
translation: The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.

text: إن جهنم كانت مرصادا
translation: Certainly Hell lies in wait,

text: للطاغين مآبا
translation: The rebels' abode,

text: لابثين فيها أحقابا
translation: Where they will remain for aeons,

text: لا يذوقون فيها بردا ولا شرابا
translation: Finding neither sleep nor any thing to drink

text: إلا حميما وغساقا
translation: Except boiling water and benumbing cold:

text: جزاء وفاقا
translation: , A fitting reward.

text: إنهم كانوا لا يرجون حسابا
translation: They were those who did not expect a reckoning,

text: وكذبوا بآياتنا كذابا
translation: And rejected Our signs as lies.

text: وكل شيء أحصيناه كتابا
translation: We have kept account of everything in a book.

text: فذوقوا فلن نزيدكم إلا عذابا
translation: So taste (the fruit of what you sowed), for We shall add nothing but torment,

text: إن للمتقين مفازا
translation: As for those who preserve themselves from evil and follow the straight path, there is attainment for them:

text: حدائق وأعنابا
translation: Orchards and vineyards,

text: وكواعب أترابا
translation: And graceful maidens of the same age,

text: وكأسا دهاقا
translation: And flasks full and flowing.

text: لا يسمعون فيها لغوا ولا كذابا
translation: They will hear no blasphemies there or disavowals:

text: جزاء من ربك عطاء حسابا
translation: A recompense from your Lord, a sufficient gift,

text: رب السماوات والأرض وما بينهما الرحمٰن ۖ لا يملكون منه خطابا
translation: The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all that lies between them, most benevolent, to whom none may dare address a word.

text: يوم يقوم الروح والملائكة صفا ۖ لا يتكلمون إلا من أذن له الرحمٰن وقال صوابا
translation: The day the Spirit takes its stand, with the angels ranged in rows. None will speak except who is permitted by Ar-Rahman and says what is right.

text: ذٰلك اليوم الحق ۖ فمن شاء اتخذ إلىٰ ربه مآبا
translation: That day is certain. So whosoever likes may prepare a way to his Lord.

text: إنا أنذرناكم عذابا قريبا يوم ينظر المرء ما قدمت يداه ويقول الكافر يا ليتني كنت ترابا
translation: We have indeed warned you of a calamity near at hand, a day when man will see what he had sent (of his deeds) ahead, and the unbeliever will say: "Woe alas. Ah would that I were dust!"

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والنازعات غرقا
translation: I CALL TO WITNESS those who dive and drag,

text: والناشطات نشطا
translation: And those who undo the bonds gently,

text: والسابحات سبحا
translation: And those who glide swimmingly,

text: فالسابقات سبقا
translation: Then outpace the others swiftly

text: فالمدبرات أمرا
translation: And direct affairs by command,

text: يوم ترجف الراجفة
translation: The day the convulsive (first blast) shatters convulsively

text: تتبعها الرادفة
translation: Followed by the second blast,

text: قلوب يومئذ واجفة
translation: Hearts will pound loudly on that day,

text: أبصارها خاشعة
translation: Eyes be lowered in submission.

text: يقولون أإنا لمردودون في الحافرة
translation: They say: "Shall we go back to our original state

text: أإذا كنا عظاما نخرة
translation: After having turned to carious bones?"

text: قالوا تلك إذا كرة خاسرة
translation: They say: "Then this returning will be a dead loss."

text: فإنما هي زجرة واحدة
translation: It will only be a single blast,

text: فإذا هم بالساهرة
translation: And they will wake up suddenly.

text: هل أتاك حديث موسىٰ
translation: Has the story of Moses come to you

text: إذ ناداه ربه بالواد المقدس طوى
translation: When his Lord called to him in Tuwa's holy vale?

text: اذهب إلىٰ فرعون إنه طغىٰ
translation: "Go to the Pharaoh who has become refractory,

text: فقل هل لك إلىٰ أن تزكىٰ
translation: And say: 'Would you like to grow (in virtue)?

text: وأهديك إلىٰ ربك فتخشىٰ
translation: Then I will guide you to your Lord that you may come to fear Him.'"

text: فأراه الآية الكبرىٰ
translation: So he showed him the greater sign;

text: فكذب وعصىٰ
translation: But (the Pharaoh) disavowed and disobeyed.

text: ثم أدبر يسعىٰ
translation: Then he turned away, deliberating,

text: فحشر فنادىٰ
translation: And assembled (his council) and proclaimed,

text: فقال أنا ربكم الأعلىٰ
translation: Saying: "I am alone your lord, the highest of them all."

text: فأخذه الله نكال الآخرة والأولىٰ
translation: So God seized him for the punishment of the Hereafter and this world.

text: إن في ذٰلك لعبرة لمن يخشىٰ
translation: Truly there is a lesson in this for those who fear (the consequences).

text: أأنتم أشد خلقا أم السماء ۚ بناها
translation: Are you more difficult to create or the heavens? He built it,

text: رفع سمكها فسواها
translation: Raised it high, proportioned it,

text: وأغطش ليلها وأخرج ضحاها
translation: Gave darkness to its night, and brightness to its day;

text: والأرض بعد ذٰلك دحاها
translation: And afterwards spread out the earth.

text: أخرج منها ماءها ومرعاها
translation: He brought out its water and its pastures from it,

text: والجبال أرساها
translation: And stabilized the mountains

text: متاعا لكم ولأنعامكم
translation: As convenience for you and your cattle.

text: فإذا جاءت الطامة الكبرىٰ
translation: When the great calamity comes,

text: يوم يتذكر الإنسان ما سعىٰ
translation: The day when man remembers all that he had done,

text: وبرزت الجحيم لمن يرىٰ
translation: And Hell made visible to him who can see,

text: فأما من طغىٰ
translation: Then he who had been rebellious

text: وآثر الحياة الدنيا
translation: And who preferred the life of the world,

text: فإن الجحيم هي المأوىٰ
translation: Will surely have Hell for his abode.

text: وأما من خاف مقام ربه ونهى النفس عن الهوىٰ
translation: But he who feared standing before his Lord, and restrained his self from vain desires,

text: فإن الجنة هي المأوىٰ
translation: Will surely have Paradise for abode.

text: يسألونك عن الساعة أيان مرساها
translation: They ask you: "When will the Hour be? When is its time fixed?"

text: فيم أنت من ذكراها
translation: What do you have to do with explaining it?

text: إلىٰ ربك منتهاها
translation: The extent of its knowledge goes to your Lord.

text: إنما أنت منذر من يخشاها
translation: Your duty is only to warn him who fears it.

text: كأنهم يوم يرونها لم يلبثوا إلا عشية أو ضحاها
translation: The day they see it, it will seem they had stayed in the world but only an evening or its turning into dawn.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم عبس وتولىٰ
translation: HE FROWNED AND turned away,

text: أن جاءه الأعمىٰ
translation: Because a blind man came to him.

text: وما يدريك لعله يزكىٰ
translation: What made you think that he will not grow in virtue,

text: أو يذكر فتنفعه الذكرىٰ
translation: Or be admonished, and the admonition profit him?

text: أما من استغنىٰ
translation: As for him who is not in want of any thing,

text: فأنت له تصدىٰ
translation: You pay full attention,

text: وما عليك ألا يزكىٰ
translation: Though it is not your concern if he should not grow (in fulness).

text: وأما من جاءك يسعىٰ
translation: As for him who comes to you striving (after goodness),

text: وهو يخشىٰ
translation: And is also fearful (of God),

text: فأنت عنه تلهىٰ
translation: You neglect.

text: كلا إنها تذكرة
translation: Assuredly this is a reminder

text: فمن شاء ذكره
translation: For any one who desires to bear it in mind,

text: في صحف مكرمة
translation: (Contained) in honoured pages,

text: مرفوعة مطهرة
translation: Exalted and holy,

text: بأيدي سفرة
translation: In the hands of scribes

text: كرام بررة
translation: Noble and pious.

text: قتل الإنسان ما أكفره
translation: Accursed is man. How ungrateful is he!

text: من أي شيء خلقه
translation: Of what substance God created him?

text: من نطفة خلقه فقدره
translation: From a single sperm He created, then proportioned him,

text: ثم السبيل يسره
translation: Then made his passage easy (at birth);

text: ثم أماته فأقبره
translation: He will then send him to death and have him laid in the grave.

text: ثم إذا شاء أنشره
translation: Then He will raise him up again when He please.

text: كلا لما يقض ما أمره
translation: But no. He has not fulfilled what was enjoined on him.

text: فلينظر الإنسان إلىٰ طعامه
translation: Let man therefore consider (the sources of) his food.

text: أنا صببنا الماء صبا
translation: We poured down rain abundantly,

text: ثم شققنا الأرض شقا
translation: Then We cracked the earth open under pressure (of germination)

text: فأنبتنا فيها حبا
translation: And We made corn grow,

text: وعنبا وقضبا
translation: And grapes and herbage,

text: وزيتونا ونخلا
translation: Olives and dates,

text: وحدائق غلبا
translation: Orchards thick with trees,

text: وفاكهة وأبا
translation: And fruits and fodder:

text: متاعا لكم ولأنعامكم
translation: A provision for you and your cattle.

text: فإذا جاءت الصاخة
translation: But when the great calamity comes

text: يوم يفر المرء من أخيه
translation: Man will fly from his brother,

text: وأمه وأبيه
translation: Mother and father,

text: وصاحبته وبنيه
translation: As well as his wife and children.

text: لكل امرئ منهم يومئذ شأن يغنيه
translation: Each man will have enough cares that day.

text: وجوه يومئذ مسفرة
translation: Many faces will that day be bright,

text: ضاحكة مستبشرة
translation: Laughing and full of joy,

text: ووجوه يومئذ عليها غبرة
translation: And many will be dust-begrimed,

text: ترهقها قترة
translation: Covered with the blackness (of shame):

text: أولٰئك هم الكفرة الفجرة
translation: They will be the unbelievers, transgressors.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم إذا الشمس كورت
translation: WHEN THE SUN is folded up,

text: وإذا النجوم انكدرت
translation: The stars turn dim and scatter,

text: وإذا الجبال سيرت
translation: The mountains made to move,

text: وإذا العشار عطلت
translation: The ten-month pregnant female camels are abandoned,

text: وإذا الوحوش حشرت
translation: The wild beasts stampede on the run,

text: وإذا البحار سجرت
translation: When the oceans surge and swell,

text: وإذا النفوس زوجت
translation: When souls are reunited (with the bodies)

text: وإذا الموءودة سئلت
translation: And the little girl buried alive is asked

text: بأي ذنب قتلت
translation: For what crime she was put to death;

text: وإذا الصحف نشرت
translation: When the ledgers are laid open,

text: وإذا السماء كشطت
translation: The curtain drawn back from the skies,

text: وإذا الجحيم سعرت
translation: When Hell is set ablaze,

text: وإذا الجنة أزلفت
translation: And Paradise brought near,

text: علمت نفس ما أحضرت
translation: (Then) every soul will know what it had prepared (for itself).

text: فلا أقسم بالخنس
translation: So, I call the receding stars to witness,

text: الجوار الكنس
translation: The planets withdrawing into themselves,

text: والليل إذا عسعس
translation: The closing night,

text: والصبح إذا تنفس
translation: The rising dawn,

text: إنه لقول رسول كريم
translation: That this is indeed the word of an honoured Messenger,

text: ذي قوة عند ذي العرش مكين
translation: Full of power, well-established (in position) with the Lord and Master of the Throne,

text: مطاع ثم أمين
translation: Obeyed and worthy there of trust.

text: وما صاحبكم بمجنون
translation: Your companion is not mad.

text: ولقد رآه بالأفق المبين
translation: He had surely seen Him on the clear horizon.

text: وما هو على الغيب بضنين
translation: He is not chary of making public what is unknown.

text: وما هو بقول شيطان رجيم
translation: This is not the utterance of an accursed devil.

text: فأين تذهبون
translation: So whither do you stray?

text: إن هو إلا ذكر للعالمين
translation: This is a reminder for all the peoples of the world,

text: لمن شاء منكم أن يستقيم
translation: For those of you who desire to walk the path that is straight,

text: وما تشاءون إلا أن يشاء الله رب العالمين
translation: Though you cannot desire except as God will, the Lord of all the worlds.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم إذا السماء انفطرت
translation: WHEN THE SKY is split asunder,

text: وإذا الكواكب انتثرت
translation: And the stars dispersed,

text: وإذا البحار فجرت
translation: When the oceans begin to flow,

text: وإذا القبور بعثرت
translation: When the graves are overturned,

text: علمت نفس ما قدمت وأخرت
translation: Each soul will know what it had sent ahead and what it had left behind.

text: يا أيها الإنسان ما غرك بربك الكريم
translation: O man, what seduced you from your munificent Lord

text: الذي خلقك فسواك فعدلك
translation: Who created you then formed your symmetry, then gave you right proportion,

text: في أي صورة ما شاء ركبك
translation: Shaping you into any form He pleased?

text: كلا بل تكذبون بالدين
translation: Even then you deny the Judgement.

text: وإن عليكم لحافظين
translation: Surely there are guardians over you,

text: كراما كاتبين
translation: Illustrious scribes

text: يعلمون ما تفعلون
translation: Who know what you do.

text: إن الأبرار لفي نعيم
translation: The pious will surely be in heaven,

text: وإن الفجار لفي جحيم
translation: The wicked certainly in Hell:

text: يصلونها يوم الدين
translation: They will burn in it on the Day of Judgement,

text: وما هم عنها بغائبين
translation: And will not be removed from it.

text: وما أدراك ما يوم الدين
translation: How can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?

text: ثم ما أدراك ما يوم الدين
translation: How then can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?

text: يوم لا تملك نفس لنفس شيئا ۖ والأمر يومئذ لله
translation: It is the day when no soul will have power to do the least for a soul, and God's alone will be done.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم ويل للمطففين
translation: WOE TO THOSE who give short measure,

text: الذين إذا اكتالوا على الناس يستوفون
translation: Who insist on being given full when they take from others,

text: وإذا كالوهم أو وزنوهم يخسرون
translation: Whilst when they measure or weigh for them, give less.

text: ألا يظن أولٰئك أنهم مبعوثون
translation: Do they not think they will be raised (to life) again

text: ليوم عظيم
translation: On a grievous day,

text: يوم يقوم الناس لرب العالمين
translation: The day all mankind will stand before the Lord of all the worlds?

text: كلا إن كتاب الفجار لفي سجين
translation: Indeed the ledger of the wicked will be in (the lowest depths) Sijjin.

text: وما أدراك ما سجين
translation: How will you comprehend what Sijjin is?

text: كتاب مرقوم
translation: It is a (repository of) distinctly written record.

text: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation: Ah the woe that day for those who deny,

text: الذين يكذبون بيوم الدين
translation: Who call the Day of judgement a lie!

text: وما يكذب به إلا كل معتد أثيم
translation: None denies it but the sinful transgressors.

text: إذا تتلىٰ عليه آياتنا قال أساطير الأولين
translation: When Our revelations are recited before him, he says: "These are fables of long ago."

text: كلا ۖ بل ۜ ران علىٰ قلوبهم ما كانوا يكسبون
translation: No. In fact what they have been doing has rusted their hearts.

text: كلا إنهم عن ربهم يومئذ لمحجوبون
translation: Therefore they will be screened off from their Lord that day,

text: ثم إنهم لصالو الجحيم
translation: Then they will indeed burn in Hell.

text: ثم يقال هٰذا الذي كنتم به تكذبون
translation: They will then be told: "This is what you had denied."

text: كلا إن كتاب الأبرار لفي عليين
translation: Surely the ledger of the pious will be in 'Illiyun (heights above the heights).

text: وما أدراك ما عليون
translation: But how will you comprehend what 'Illiyun is?

text: كتاب مرقوم
translation: It is a (repository of) distinctly written record

text: يشهده المقربون
translation: Witnessed by those who are honoured.

text: إن الأبرار لفي نعيم
translation: Verily the pious will be in heaven,

text: على الأرائك ينظرون
translation: On couches face to face.

text: تعرف في وجوههم نضرة النعيم
translation: On their faces you will see the glow of beatitude.

text: يسقون من رحيق مختوم
translation: They will be served the choicest wine, sealed

text: ختامه مسك ۚ وفي ذٰلك فليتنافس المتنافسون
translation: With a sealing of musk, which those who aspire for the best should desire, --

text: ومزاجه من تسنيم
translation: Blended with the water of Tasnim, (heights ultimate of evolution),

text: عينا يشرب بها المقربون
translation: A fountain from which only they who are honoured drink.

text: إن الذين أجرموا كانوا من الذين آمنوا يضحكون
translation: The sinners indeed laughed at believers

text: وإذا مروا بهم يتغامزون
translation: And winked at one another as they passed by them;

text: وإذا انقلبوا إلىٰ أهلهم انقلبوا فكهين
translation: And when they went back to their people turned to make fun of them;

text: وإذا رأوهم قالوا إن هٰؤلاء لضالون
translation: And when they saw them, they said: "They have indeed gone astray."

text: وما أرسلوا عليهم حافظين
translation: But they were not Sent to be guardians over them!

text: فاليوم الذين آمنوا من الكفار يضحكون
translation: So, the believers will laugh at the infidels on that day,

text: على الأرائك ينظرون
translation: Regarding them from their cushioned seats.

text: هل ثوب الكفار ما كانوا يفعلون
translation: Will not the infidels pay for what they had done?

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم إذا السماء انشقت
translation: WHEN THE SKY is cleft asunder,

text: وأذنت لربها وحقت
translation: And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,

text: وإذا الأرض مدت
translation: When the earth is stretched out taut

text: وألقت ما فيها وتخلت
translation: And throws out whatever it contains and is empty,

text: وأذنت لربها وحقت
translation: And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,

text: يا أيها الإنسان إنك كادح إلىٰ ربك كدحا فملاقيه
translation: O man, you have to strive and go on striving towards your Lord, then will you meet Him.

text: فأما من أوتي كتابه بيمينه
translation: And he who is given his ledger in his right hand

text: فسوف يحاسب حسابا يسيرا
translation: Will have an easy reckoning,

text: وينقلب إلىٰ أهله مسرورا
translation: And will return to his people full of joy.

text: وأما من أوتي كتابه وراء ظهره
translation: But he who is given his ledger from behind his back

text: فسوف يدعو ثبورا
translation: Will pray for death,

text: ويصلىٰ سعيرا
translation: But will be roasted in the fire.

text: إنه كان في أهله مسرورا
translation: He lived rejoicing among his people,

text: إنه ظن أن لن يحور
translation: Never thinking he will return.

text: بلىٰ إن ربه كان به بصيرا
translation: Why not? His Lord was always watching him.

text: فلا أقسم بالشفق
translation: So indeed I call to witness the evening twilight,

text: والليل وما وسق
translation: And the night and all it gathers,

text: والقمر إذا اتسق
translation: And the moon when at the full,

text: لتركبن طبقا عن طبق
translation: That you will climb from stage to stage.

text: فما لهم لا يؤمنون
translation: So, wherefore do they not believe?

text: وإذا قرئ عليهم القرآن لا يسجدون ۩
translation: And when the Qur'an is recited to them do not bow in adoration?

text: بل الذين كفروا يكذبون
translation: In fact the unbelievers disavow.

text: والله أعلم بما يوعون
translation: But God knows what they harbour in their breasts.

text: فبشرهم بعذاب أليم
translation: So give them news of painful punishment,

text: إلا الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم أجر غير ممنون
translation: Except those who believe and do the right: For them there is reward unending.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والسماء ذات البروج
translation: I CALL TO witness the sky (bespangled) with the signs of the Zodiac,

text: واليوم الموعود
translation: And the promised day,

text: وشاهد ومشهود
translation: And the witness and the witnessed,

text: قتل أصحاب الأخدود
translation: That accursed are the men of the trench

text: النار ذات الوقود
translation: Full of fire fed by faggots,

text: إذ هم عليها قعود
translation: As they sat around it

text: وهم علىٰ ما يفعلون بالمؤمنين شهود
translation: Witnessing what they had done to the believers!

text: وما نقموا منهم إلا أن يؤمنوا بالله العزيز الحميد
translation: They had no other reason for hating them except that they believed in God the mighty, worthy of praise,

text: الذي له ملك السماوات والأرض ۚ والله علىٰ كل شيء شهيد
translation: Whose kingdom spreads over the heavens and the earth. God is witness over everything.

text: إن الذين فتنوا المؤمنين والمؤمنات ثم لم يتوبوا فلهم عذاب جهنم ولهم عذاب الحريق
translation: Surely for those who persecute believers, men and women, and do not repent afterwards, is the punishment of Hell, and the punishment of burning.

text: إن الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم جنات تجري من تحتها الأنهار ۚ ذٰلك الفوز الكبير
translation: Surely for those who believe and do the right are gardens with rivers running by. That is the greatest success.

text: إن بطش ربك لشديد
translation: The grip of your Lord is severe indeed!

text: إنه هو يبدئ ويعيد
translation: It is verily He who initiates and repeats.

text: وهو الغفور الودود
translation: He is the forgiving and the loving,

text: ذو العرش المجيد
translation: The Lord of the glorious Throne,

text: فعال لما يريد
translation: Who does as He pleases.

text: هل أتاك حديث الجنود
translation: Has the story of the hordes

text: فرعون وثمود
translation: Of Pharaoh and Thamud come to you?

text: بل الذين كفروا في تكذيب
translation: Yet the infidels persist in denial.

text: والله من ورائهم محيط
translation: But God surrounds them from all sides.

text: بل هو قرآن مجيد
translation: This is indeed the glorious Qur'an

text: في لوح محفوظ
translation: (Preserved) on the guarded tablet.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والسماء والطارق
translation: I CALL TO witness the heavens and the night Star --

text: وما أدراك ما الطارق
translation: How will you comprehend what the night star is?

text: النجم الثاقب
translation: It is the star that shines with a piercing brightness --

text: إن كل نفس لما عليها حافظ
translation: That over each soul there is a guardian.

text: فلينظر الإنسان مم خلق
translation: Let man consider what he was made of:

text: خلق من ماء دافق
translation: He was created of spurting water

text: يخرج من بين الصلب والترائب
translation: Issuing from (the pelvis) between the backbone and the ribs.

text: إنه علىٰ رجعه لقادر
translation: God has certainly power to bring him back (from the dead).

text: يوم تبلى السرائر
translation: The day all secrets are examined

text: فما له من قوة ولا ناصر
translation: He will have no strength or helper.

text: والسماء ذات الرجع
translation: So I call to witness the rain-producing sky,

text: والأرض ذات الصدع
translation: And the earth which opens up (with verdure),

text: إنه لقول فصل
translation: That this (Qur'an) is a decisive word

text: وما هو بالهزل
translation: And no trifle.

text: إنهم يكيدون كيدا
translation: They are hatching up a plot,

text: وأكيد كيدا
translation: But I too am devising a plan.

text: فمهل الكافرين أمهلهم رويدا
translation: So bear with unbelievers with patience, and give them respite for a while.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم سبح اسم ربك الأعلى
translation: GLORIFY THE NAME of your Lord, most high,

text: الذي خلق فسوىٰ
translation: Who creates and proportions,

text: والذي قدر فهدىٰ
translation: Who determines and directs,

text: والذي أخرج المرعىٰ
translation: Who brings out the pastures

text: فجعله غثاء أحوىٰ
translation: Then reduces them to rusty rubbish.

text: سنقرئك فلا تنسىٰ
translation: We shall make you recite (the Qur'an) so that you will not forget it,

text: إلا ما شاء الله ۚ إنه يعلم الجهر وما يخفىٰ
translation: Unless God may please. He knows the visible and knows what is hidden.

text: ونيسرك لليسرىٰ
translation: We shall take you slowly towards ease.

text: فذكر إن نفعت الذكرىٰ
translation: So remind them if reminder is profitable:

text: سيذكر من يخشىٰ
translation: Those who fear will understand.

text: ويتجنبها الأشقى
translation: Only the wretch will turn aside,

text: الذي يصلى النار الكبرىٰ
translation: Who will burn in the terrible Fire,

text: ثم لا يموت فيها ولا يحيىٰ
translation: In which he will neither die nor live.

text: قد أفلح من تزكىٰ
translation: Surely he will succeed who grows in goodness,

text: وذكر اسم ربه فصلىٰ
translation: And recites the name of his Lord and serves with devotion.

text: بل تؤثرون الحياة الدنيا
translation: But no, you prefer the life of the world,

text: والآخرة خير وأبقىٰ
translation: Though the life to come is better and abiding.

text: إن هٰذا لفي الصحف الأولىٰ
translation: This is surely in the earlier Books,

text: صحف إبراهيم وموسىٰ
translation: The Books of Abraham and Moses.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم هل أتاك حديث الغاشية
translation: HAS NEWS OF the Overpowering Event reached you?

text: وجوه يومئذ خاشعة
translation: Many faces will be contrite on that day,

text: عاملة ناصبة
translation: Labouring, wearied out,

text: تصلىٰ نارا حامية
translation: Burning in the scorching fire,

text: تسقىٰ من عين آنية
translation: Given water from the boiling spring to drink.

text: ليس لهم طعام إلا من ضريع
translation: They will have no food except bitter thorn,

text: لا يسمن ولا يغني من جوع
translation: Neither nourishing nor banishing hunger.

text: وجوه يومئذ ناعمة
translation: Many faces will be joyous on that day,

text: لسعيها راضية
translation: Well-pleased with their endeavour,

text: في جنة عالية
translation: In the high empyrean,

text: لا تسمع فيها لاغية
translation: Never hearing idle talk.

text: فيها عين جارية
translation: There is a stream of running water in it;

text: فيها سرر مرفوعة
translation: And within it are couches placed on high,

text: وأكواب موضوعة
translation: Goblets set,

text: ونمارق مصفوفة
translation: Cushions arranged,

text: وزرابي مبثوثة
translation: And rich carpets spread.

text: أفلا ينظرون إلى الإبل كيف خلقت
translation: Do they not then ponder how the clouds were formed;

text: وإلى السماء كيف رفعت
translation: And the heavens, how it was raised high;

text: وإلى الجبال كيف نصبت
translation: And the mountains, how they were fixed;

text: وإلى الأرض كيف سطحت
translation: And the earth, how it was spread out?

text: فذكر إنما أنت مذكر
translation: Remind them; you are surely a reminder.

text: لست عليهم بمصيطر
translation: You are not a warden over them,

text: إلا من تولىٰ وكفر
translation: Other than him who turns his back and denies,

text: فيعذبه الله العذاب الأكبر
translation: In which case he will be punished by God with the severest punishment.

text: إن إلينا إيابهم
translation: To Us is surely their returning;

text: ثم إن علينا حسابهم
translation: Ours is surely then to reckon with them.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والفجر
translation: I CALL TO witness the dawn

text: وليال عشر
translation: And the Ten Nights,

text: والشفع والوتر
translation: The multiple and the one,

text: والليل إذا يسر
translation: The night as it advances,

text: هل في ذٰلك قسم لذي حجر
translation: Is there not an evidence in this for those who have sense?

text: ألم تر كيف فعل ربك بعاد
translation: Have you not seen what your Lord did to the 'Ad

text: إرم ذات العماد
translation: Of Eram with lofty pillars (erected as signposts in the desert),

text: التي لم يخلق مثلها في البلاد
translation: The like of whom were never created in the realm;

text: وثمود الذين جابوا الصخر بالواد
translation: And with Thamud who carved rocks in the valley;

text: وفرعون ذي الأوتاد
translation: And the mighty Pharaoh

text: الذين طغوا في البلاد
translation: Who terrorised the region,

text: فأكثروا فيها الفساد
translation: And multiplied corruption.

text: فصب عليهم ربك سوط عذاب
translation: So your Lord poured a scourge of punishment over them.

text: إن ربك لبالمرصاد
translation: Your Lord is certainly in wait.

text: فأما الإنسان إذا ما ابتلاه ربه فأكرمه ونعمه فيقول ربي أكرمن
translation: As for man, whenever his Lord tries him and then is gracious and provides good things for him, he says: "My Lord has been gracious to me."

text: وأما إذا ما ابتلاه فقدر عليه رزقه فيقول ربي أهانن
translation: But when He tries him by restraining his means, he says: "My Lord despises me."

text: كلا ۖ بل لا تكرمون اليتيم
translation: No. In fact you are not generous to the orphans,

text: ولا تحاضون علىٰ طعام المسكين
translation: Nor do you urge one another to feed the poor,

text: وتأكلون التراث أكلا لما
translation: And you devour (others') inheritance greedily,

text: وتحبون المال حبا جما
translation: And love wealth with all your heart.

text: كلا إذا دكت الأرض دكا دكا
translation: Surely when We pound the earth to powder grounded, pounded to dust,

text: وجاء ربك والملك صفا صفا
translation: And comes your Lord, and angels row on row,

text: وجيء يومئذ بجهنم ۚ يومئذ يتذكر الإنسان وأنىٰ له الذكرىٰ
translation: And Hell is brought near, that day will man remember, but of what avail will then remembering be?

text: يقول يا ليتني قدمت لحياتي
translation: He will say: "Alas the woe! Would that I had sent ahead something in my life."

text: فيومئذ لا يعذب عذابه أحد
translation: None can punish as He will punish on that day,

text: ولا يوثق وثاقه أحد
translation: And none can bind as He will bind.

text: يا أيتها النفس المطمئنة
translation: O you tranquil soul,

text: ارجعي إلىٰ ربك راضية مرضية
translation: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and well-pleasing Him.

text: فادخلي في عبادي
translation: "Enter then among My votaries,

text: وادخلي جنتي
translation: Enter then My garden."

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم لا أقسم بهٰذا البلد
translation: I CALL THIS earth to witness --

text: وأنت حل بهٰذا البلد
translation: And you are free to live upon it, --

text: ووالد وما ولد
translation: And the parent and the offspring,

text: لقد خلقنا الإنسان في كبد
translation: That We created man in toil and trouble.

text: أيحسب أن لن يقدر عليه أحد
translation: Does he think that no one has power over him?

text: يقول أهلكت مالا لبدا
translation: He says: "I have wasted a great deal of wealth."

text: أيحسب أن لم يره أحد
translation: Does he think that no one sees him?

text: ألم نجعل له عينين
translation: Did We not give him two eyes,

text: ولسانا وشفتين
translation: One tongue, and two lips,

text: وهديناه النجدين
translation: And showed him two highways (of good and evil)?

text: فلا اقتحم العقبة
translation: But he could not scale the steep ascent.

text: وما أدراك ما العقبة
translation: How will you comprehend what the Steep ascent is? --

text: فك رقبة
translation: To free a neck (from the burden of debt or slavery),

text: أو إطعام في يوم ذي مسغبة
translation: Or to feed in times of famine

text: يتيما ذا مقربة
translation: The orphan near in relationship,

text: أو مسكينا ذا متربة
translation: Or the poor in distress;

text: ثم كان من الذين آمنوا وتواصوا بالصبر وتواصوا بالمرحمة
translation: And to be of those who believe, and urge upon one another to persevere, and urge upon each other to be kind.

text: أولٰئك أصحاب الميمنة
translation: They are the people of the right hand (and will succeed).

text: والذين كفروا بآياتنا هم أصحاب المشأمة
translation: But those who deny Our revelations are the people of the left hand:

text: عليهم نار مؤصدة
translation: The Fire will vault them over.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والشمس وضحاها
translation: I CALL TO witness the sun and his early morning splendour,

text: والقمر إذا تلاها
translation: And the moon as she follows in his wake,

text: والنهار إذا جلاها
translation: The day when it reveals his radiance,

text: والليل إذا يغشاها
translation: The night when it covers him over,

text: والسماء وما بناها
translation: The heavens and its architecture,

text: والأرض وما طحاها
translation: The earth and its spreading out,

text: ونفس وما سواها
translation: The soul and how it was integrated

text: فألهمها فجورها وتقواها
translation: And given the faculty of knowing what is disruptive and what is intrinsic to it.

text: قد أفلح من زكاها
translation: He who nourishes it will surely be successful,

text: وقد خاب من دساها
translation: And he who confines it will surely come to grief.

text: كذبت ثمود بطغواها
translation: The Thamud denied (the truth) in their perverseness

text: إذ انبعث أشقاها
translation: When among them the great wretch arose,

text: فقال لهم رسول الله ناقة الله وسقياها
translation: And the apostle of God had to tell them: "This is God's she-camel, let her drink."

text: فكذبوه فعقروها فدمدم عليهم ربهم بذنبهم فسواها
translation: But they called him a liar and hamstrung her. So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.

text: ولا يخاف عقباها
translation: He does not fear the consequence.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والليل إذا يغشىٰ
translation: I CALL THE night to witness when it covers over,

text: والنهار إذا تجلىٰ
translation: And the day when it shines in all its glory,

text: وما خلق الذكر والأنثىٰ
translation: And Him who created the male and female,

text: إن سعيكم لشتىٰ
translation: That your endeavour is for different ends.

text: فأما من أعطىٰ واتقىٰ
translation: Yet he who gives to others and has fear,

text: وصدق بالحسنىٰ
translation: And affirms goodness,

text: فسنيسره لليسرىٰ
translation: We shall ease the way of fortune for him.

text: وأما من بخل واستغنىٰ
translation: But he who does not give and is unconcerned,

text: وكذب بالحسنىٰ
translation: And rejects goodness,

text: فسنيسره للعسرىٰ
translation: For him We shall ease the way of adversity,

text: وما يغني عنه ماله إذا تردىٰ
translation: And his riches will not avail him when he falls headlong (into the Abyss).

text: إن علينا للهدىٰ
translation: It is indeed for Us to show the way,

text: وإن لنا للآخرة والأولىٰ
translation: And to Us belong the End and the Beginning.

text: فأنذرتكم نارا تلظىٰ
translation: So, I warn you of the blazing Fire.

text: لا يصلاها إلا الأشقى
translation: No one will burn in it but the most wretched,

text: الذي كذب وتولىٰ
translation: Who denied (the truth) and turned away.

text: وسيجنبها الأتقى
translation: But save him who fears

text: الذي يؤتي ماله يتزكىٰ
translation: And gives of his wealth that he may grow in virtue,

text: وما لأحد عنده من نعمة تجزىٰ
translation: And is under no one's obligation to return his favour,

text: إلا ابتغاء وجه ربه الأعلىٰ
translation: Other than seeking the glory of his Lord, most high,

text: ولسوف يرضىٰ
translation: Will surely be gratified.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والضحىٰ
translation: I CALL TO witness the early hours of morning,

text: والليل إذا سجىٰ
translation: And the night when dark and still,

text: ما ودعك ربك وما قلىٰ
translation: Your Lord has neither left you, nor despises you.

text: وللآخرة خير لك من الأولىٰ
translation: What is to come is better for you than what has gone before;

text: ولسوف يعطيك ربك فترضىٰ
translation: For your Lord will certainly give you, and you will be content.

text: ألم يجدك يتيما فآوىٰ
translation: Did He not find you an orphan and take care of you?

text: ووجدك ضالا فهدىٰ
translation: Did He not find you perplexed, and show you the way?

text: ووجدك عائلا فأغنىٰ
translation: Did He not find you poor and enrich you?

text: فأما اليتيم فلا تقهر
translation: So do not oppress the orphan,

text: وأما السائل فلا تنهر
translation: And do not drive the beggar away,

text: وأما بنعمة ربك فحدث
translation: And keep recounting the favours of your Lord.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم ألم نشرح لك صدرك
translation: HAVE WE NOT opened up your breast

text: ووضعنا عنك وزرك
translation: And removed your burden

text: الذي أنقض ظهرك
translation: Which had left you devoid of hope,

text: ورفعنا لك ذكرك
translation: And exalted your fame?

text: فإن مع العسر يسرا
translation: Surely with hardship there is ease.

text: إن مع العسر يسرا
translation: With hardship indeed there is ease.

text: فإذا فرغت فانصب
translation: So when you are free work diligently,

text: وإلىٰ ربك فارغب
translation: And turn to your Lord with all your love.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والتين والزيتون
translation: I CALL TO witness the Fig and the Olive,

text: وطور سينين
translation: The Mount Sinai,

text: وهٰذا البلد الأمين
translation: And this Soil Secure,

text: لقد خلقنا الإنسان في أحسن تقويم
translation: That We created man of finest possibilities,

text: ثم رددناه أسفل سافلين
translation: Then brought him down to the lowest of the low,

text: إلا الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات فلهم أجر غير ممنون
translation: Except those who believe and do the right, for whom there is reward undiminished.

text: فما يكذبك بعد بالدين
translation: Who should then make you deny the Judgement after this?

text: أليس الله بأحكم الحاكمين
translation: Is not God the most equitable of all judges?

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم اقرأ باسم ربك الذي خلق
translation: READ IN THE name of your Lord who created,

text: خلق الإنسان من علق
translation: Created man from an embryo;

text: اقرأ وربك الأكرم
translation: Read, for your Lord is most beneficent,

text: الذي علم بالقلم
translation: Who taught by the pen,

text: علم الإنسان ما لم يعلم
translation: Taught man what he did not know.

text: كلا إن الإنسان ليطغىٰ
translation: And yet, but yet man is rebellious,

text: أن رآه استغنىٰ
translation: For he thinks he is sufficient in himself.

text: إن إلىٰ ربك الرجعىٰ
translation: Surely your returning is to your Lord.

text: أرأيت الذي ينهىٰ
translation: Have you seen him who restrains

text: عبدا إذا صلىٰ
translation: A votary when he turns to his devotions?

text: أرأيت إن كان على الهدىٰ
translation: Have you thought, if he had been on guidance

text: أو أمر بالتقوىٰ
translation: Or had enjoined piety, (it would have been better)?

text: أرأيت إن كذب وتولىٰ
translation: Have you thought that if he denies and turns away,

text: ألم يعلم بأن الله يرىٰ
translation: Does he not know that God sees?

text: كلا لئن لم ينته لنسفعا بالناصية
translation: And yet indeed if he does not desist We shall drag him by the forelock,

text: ناصية كاذبة خاطئة
translation: By the lying, the sinful forelock.

text: فليدع ناديه
translation: So let him call his associates,

text: سندع الزبانية
translation: We shall call the guards of Hell.

text: كلا لا تطعه واسجد واقترب ۩
translation: Beware! Do not obey him, but bow in adoration and draw near (to your Lord).

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم إنا أنزلناه في ليلة القدر
translation: TRULY WE REVEALED it on the Night of Determination.

text: وما أدراك ما ليلة القدر
translation: How will you know what the Night of Determination is?

text: ليلة القدر خير من ألف شهر
translation: Better is the Night of Determination than a thousand months.

text: تنزل الملائكة والروح فيها بإذن ربهم من كل أمر
translation: On (this night) the angels and grace descend by the dispensation of their Lord, for settling all affairs.

text: سلام هي حتىٰ مطلع الفجر
translation: It is peace till the dawning of the day.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم لم يكن الذين كفروا من أهل الكتاب والمشركين منفكين حتىٰ تأتيهم البينة
translation: THOSE AMONG THE people of the Book who disbelieve, and the idolaters, would not have been freed (from false beliefs) until the clear proof came to them --

text: رسول من الله يتلو صحفا مطهرة
translation: An Apostle from God, reading out hallowed pages

text: فيها كتب قيمة
translation: Containing firm decrees.

text: وما تفرق الذين أوتوا الكتاب إلا من بعد ما جاءتهم البينة
translation: The people of the Book were not divided among themselves till after the clear proof had come to them.

text: وما أمروا إلا ليعبدوا الله مخلصين له الدين حنفاء ويقيموا الصلاة ويؤتوا الزكاة ۚ وذٰلك دين القيمة
translation: They were commanded only to serve God with all-exclusive faith in Him, to be upright, and to fulfil their devotional obligations, and to give zakat; for this is the even way.

text: إن الذين كفروا من أهل الكتاب والمشركين في نار جهنم خالدين فيها ۚ أولٰئك هم شر البرية
translation: Surely the unbelievers among the people of the Book and the idolaters, will abide in the fire of Hell. They are the worst of creatures.

text: إن الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات أولٰئك هم خير البرية
translation: But those who believe and do the right are surely the best of created beings,

text: جزاؤهم عند ربهم جنات عدن تجري من تحتها الأنهار خالدين فيها أبدا ۖ رضي الله عنهم ورضوا عنه ۚ ذٰلك لمن خشي ربه
translation: Whose reward is with their Lord -- gardens of Eden with rivers flowing by, where they will abide for ever, God pleased with their service, they with obedience to Him. This (awaits) him who stands in awe of his Lord.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم إذا زلزلت الأرض زلزالها
translation: WHEN THE WORLD is shaken up by its cataclysm,

text: وأخرجت الأرض أثقالها
translation: And the earth throws out its burdens,

text: وقال الإنسان ما لها
translation: And man enquires: "What has come over it?"

text: يومئذ تحدث أخبارها
translation: That day it will narrate its annals,

text: بأن ربك أوحىٰ لها
translation: For your Lord will have commanded it.

text: يومئذ يصدر الناس أشتاتا ليروا أعمالهم
translation: That day people will proceed separately to be shown their deeds.

text: فمن يعمل مثقال ذرة خيرا يره
translation: Whosoever has done even an atom's weight of good will behold it;

text: ومن يعمل مثقال ذرة شرا يره
translation: And whosoever has done even an atom's weight of evil will behold that.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والعاديات ضبحا
translation: I CALL TO witness the chargers, snorting, rushing to battle before the others,

text: فالموريات قدحا
translation: Then those striking sparks of fire,

text: فالمغيرات صبحا
translation: Then those charging in the morning

text: فأثرن به نقعا
translation: Raising clouds of dust,

text: فوسطن به جمعا
translation: Penetrating deep into the armies,

text: إن الإنسان لربه لكنود
translation: That man is ungrateful to his Lord

text: وإنه علىٰ ذٰلك لشهيد
translation: And is himself witness to it,

text: وإنه لحب الخير لشديد
translation: And is intractable in his love of worldly goods.

text: أفلا يعلم إذا بعثر ما في القبور
translation: Does he not know when the contents of the graves are laid bare

text: وحصل ما في الصدور
translation: And the secrets of the hearts exposed,

text: إن ربهم بهم يومئذ لخبير
translation: Surely their Lord will be aware of their (deeds).

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم القارعة
translation: THE STARTLING CALAMITY.

text: ما القارعة
translation: What is the startling calamity?

text: وما أدراك ما القارعة
translation: How will you comprehend what the startling calamity is? --

text: يوم يكون الناس كالفراش المبثوث
translation: A Day on which human beings would be like so many scattered moths,

text: وتكون الجبال كالعهن المنفوش
translation: The mountains like the tufts of carded wool.

text: فأما من ثقلت موازينه
translation: Then he whose deeds shall weigh heavier in the scale

text: فهو في عيشة راضية
translation: Will have a tranquil life;

text: وأما من خفت موازينه
translation: But he whose deeds are lighter in the balance

text: فأمه هاوية
translation: Will have the Abyss for abode.

text: وما أدراك ما هيه
translation: How will you comprehend what that is?

text: نار حامية
translation: It is the scorching fire.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم ألهاكم التكاثر
translation: THE AVARICE OF plenitude keeps you occupied

text: حتىٰ زرتم المقابر
translation: Till you reach the grave.

text: كلا سوف تعلمون
translation: But you will come to know soon; --

text: ثم كلا سوف تعلمون
translation: Indeed you will come to know soon.

text: كلا لو تعلمون علم اليقين
translation: And yet if you knew with positive knowledge

text: لترون الجحيم
translation: You have indeed to behold Hell;

text: ثم لترونها عين اليقين
translation: Then you will see it with the eye of certainty.

text: ثم لتسألن يومئذ عن النعيم
translation: Then on that day you will surely be asked about the verity of pleasures.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم والعصر
translation: TIME AND AGE are witness

text: إن الإنسان لفي خسر
translation: Man is certainly loss,

text: إلا الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات وتواصوا بالحق وتواصوا بالصبر
translation: Except those who believe, and do good and enjoin truth on one another, and enjoin one another to bear with fortitude (the trials that befall).

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم ويل لكل همزة لمزة
translation: WOE TO EVERY slanderer, back-biter,

text: الذي جمع مالا وعدده
translation: Who amasses wealth and hordes it.

text: يحسب أن ماله أخلده
translation: Does he think his wealth will abide for ever with him?

text: كلا ۖ لينبذن في الحطمة
translation: By no means. He will be thrown into Hutama.

text: وما أدراك ما الحطمة
translation: How will you comprehend what Hutama is?

text: نار الله الموقدة
translation: It is the fire kindled by God

text: التي تطلع على الأفئدة
translation: Which penetrates the hearts

text: إنها عليهم مؤصدة
translation: (And) vaults them over

text: في عمد ممددة
translation: In extending columns.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم ألم تر كيف فعل ربك بأصحاب الفيل
translation: HAVE YOU NOT seen how your Lord dealt with the people of the elephants?

text: ألم يجعل كيدهم في تضليل
translation: Did He not make their plan go wrong,

text: وأرسل عليهم طيرا أبابيل
translation: And sent hordes of chargers flying against them,

text: ترميهم بحجارة من سجيل
translation: (While) you were pelting them with stones of porphyritic lava,

text: فجعلهم كعصف مأكول
translation: And turned them into pastured fields of corn?

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم لإيلاف قريش
translation: SINCE THE QURAISH have been united,

text: إيلافهم رحلة الشتاء والصيف
translation: United to fit out caravans winter and summer,

text: فليعبدوا رب هٰذا البيت
translation: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

text: الذي أطعمهم من جوع وآمنهم من خوف
translation: Who provided them against destitution and gave them security against fear.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم أرأيت الذي يكذب بالدين
translation: HAVE YOU SEEN him who denies the Day of Judgement?

text: فذٰلك الذي يدع اليتيم
translation: It is he who pushes the orphan away,

text: ولا يحض علىٰ طعام المسكين
translation: And does not induce others to feed the needy.

text: فويل للمصلين
translation: Woe to those who pray

text: الذين هم عن صلاتهم ساهون
translation: But who are oblivious of their moral duties,

text: الذين هم يراءون
translation: Who dissimulate

text: ويمنعون الماعون
translation: And withhold things of common use (from others).

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم إنا أعطيناك الكوثر
translation: HAVE SURELY given you pre-eminence (in numbers and following);

text: فصل لربك وانحر
translation: So serve your Lord with full dedication and sacrifice.

text: إن شانئك هو الأبتر
translation: It is surely your opponents whose line will come to end.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم قل يا أيها الكافرون
translation: SAY: "O YOU unbelievers,

text: لا أعبد ما تعبدون
translation: I do not worship what you worship,

text: ولا أنتم عابدون ما أعبد
translation: Nor do you worship who I worship,

text: ولا أنا عابد ما عبدتم
translation: Nor will I worship what you worship,

text: ولا أنتم عابدون ما أعبد
translation: Nor will you worship who I worship:

text: لكم دينكم ولي دين
translation: To you your way, to me my way

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم إذا جاء نصر الله والفتح
translation: WHEN THE HELP of God arrives and victory,

text: ورأيت الناس يدخلون في دين الله أفواجا
translation: And you see men enter God's discipline horde on horde,

text: فسبح بحمد ربك واستغفره ۚ إنه كان توابا
translation: Then glorify your Lord and seek His forgiveness. Verily He is relenting.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم تبت يدا أبي لهب وتب
translation: DESTROYED WILL BE the hands of Abu Lahab, and he himself will perish.

text: ما أغنىٰ عنه ماله وما كسب
translation: Of no avail shall be his wealth, nor what he has acquired.

text: سيصلىٰ نارا ذات لهب
translation: He will be roasted in the fire,

text: وامرأته حمالة الحطب
translation: And his wife, the portress of fire wood,

text: في جيدها حبل من مسد
translation: Will have a strap of fibre rope around her neck.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم قل هو الله أحد
translation: SAY: "HE IS God the one the most unique,

text: الله الصمد
translation: God the immanently indispensable.

text: لم يلد ولم يولد
translation: He has begotten no one, and is begotten of none.

text: ولم يكن له كفوا أحد
translation: There is no one comparable to Him."

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم قل أعوذ برب الفلق
translation: SAY: "I SEEK refuge with the Lord of rising day

text: من شر ما خلق
translation: From the evil of what He has created,

text: ومن شر غاسق إذا وقب
translation: And the evil of evening darkness when it overspreads,

text: ومن شر النفاثات في العقد
translation: From the evil of sorceresses who blow incantations on knots,

text: ومن شر حاسد إذا حسد
translation: From the evil of the envier when he envies.

text: بسم الله الرحمٰن الرحيم قل أعوذ برب الناس
translation: SAY: "I SEEK refuge with the Lord of men,

text: ملك الناس
translation: The King of men,

text: إلٰه الناس
translation: The God of men,

text: من شر الوسواس الخناس
translation: From the evil of him who breathes temptations into the minds of men,

text: الذي يوسوس في صدور الناس
translation: Who suggests evil thoughts to the hearts of men --

text: من الجنة والناس
translation: From among the jinns and men.
